courses.description: 網球是一門入門門檻很高運動，如何將繁複的網球基本動作簡化到每一位學生都可輕易的吸收課程是我開這門課的重點。學生將從最重要的身體律動(協調)開始,而後是球感的培養，最後才是動作的建構。如果學生能依此方式來學習網球，一定能事半功倍，縱使是大班級的課程也是一樣。

syllabus.zh: 第一週		準備週本學期課程須注意事項規定第二週		基本截擊動作教學	1.握拍姿勢介紹2.基本動作介紹3.二人一組(一人抛球另一人截擊十次後互換練習)第三週		基本截擊動作教學	1.同上32.隔網截擊練習(手抛球方式)第四週		基本截擊動作教學1. 隔網截擊練習(抽球方式)第五週		基本扣剎球動作教學	1.握拍姿勢介紹2.基本動作介紹3.基本扣剎球動作第六週		基本扣剎球動作教學1. 基本扣剎球練習第七週		基本扣剎球動作教學1. 基本扣剎球練習第八週		期中考	隔網截擊第九週		期中考	學校學科考試第十週		綜合演練1.正反手擊球+上網截擊第十一週		綜合演練	1..正反手擊球+上網截擊+扣剎球第十二週		綜合演練	 1.正反週手擊球+上網截擊+扣剎球第十三週		迷你網球比賽1.二人小場地(半場)比賽第十四週		迷你網球比賽1.四人小場地(半場)比賽第十五週		迷你網球比賽1.單打比賽2.雙打比賽第十六週		期末考雙打比賽對抗賽第十七週		期末考體育學科考試第十八週		期末考	學校學科考試
syllabus.en: Week 1Course introductionWeek 2 Volley1.	Introduction of grip2.	Introduction of basic movement3.	Group practice ( a group of two: one throw, one volley)Week 3 Volley1.	Same above2.	Volley practice with net (Hand throw)Week 4 VolleyVolley practice (forehand)Week 5 ~ Week 7  Smash 1.	Grip2.	Basic movementSmash movementWeek 8 Mid-termVolley with netWeek 9 University mid-termWeek 10  Comprehensive practice Forehand and back hand + Net volleyWeek 11-Week 12  Comprehensive practiceForehand and back hand + Net volley+ SmashWeek 132-man half court gameWeek 144-man half court gameWeek 15 mini tournament1.	Singles 2.	Doubles Week 16Doubles tournament Week 17PE written examWeek 18University final exam

courses.weeklySchedule: 1.課程介紹、評量方法及上課注意事項說明。2.正手拍揮拍擊球練習。3.反手拍擊球練習。(分組送球)4.反手拍擊球練習。(分組送球)5.正、手拍移位擊球練習。6.正手拍截擊講解與練習。7.反手拍截擊講解與練習。8.技能測驗-反手拍擊球。9.期中考。10.殺球講解與練習。11.側旋發球講解與練習。12.比賽規則講解、綜合練習。13.雙打比賽練習。14.雙打比賽練習。15.雙打比賽練習。16.技能測驗-截擊。17.技能測驗-截擊。18.繳交學習報告及補考。

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 能了解網球的歷史及演變
能以玩球的方法學習球感及正反手拍擊球
能以兩人玩球的方式學習控球及對打
學習網球發球的基本動作
學習網球截擊的基本動作
能了解網球比賽的基本規則(單、雙打)
單、雙打戰術的研擬
能實際演練網球比賽(單、雙打及團體對抗賽)

courses.referenceBooks: 1.學校體育教材教法與評量----教育部印行-----八十六年六月2.網球技巧----李懷志編譯----益群書店股份有限公司----八十五年六月初版6刷
courses.rules: 1.第一週上課在三連堂集合2.上課要穿著運動服裝及運動鞋3.成績評量方式：技能測驗百分之五十、平時百分之四十、報告百分之十

courses.weeklySchedule: 教學以正反手拍控球和動作熟練為主，由後場動作到前場動作。先大班教學，再由練習當中個別指導和給予擊球概念。搭配跟老師不斷的來回抽球，讓學生能夠體會對打的樂趣，也能夠增進比賽戰略的技能。

courses.rules: 上課務必要穿著體育服裝和運動鞋

courses.description: 本課程為有氧舞蹈之延伸課程，教學目的在於讓學生瞭解有氧舞蹈進階動作之特性並能做出有氧舞蹈進階組合動作與肌力訓練之動作，進而享受有氧舞蹈之樂趣，增進心肺功能與養成其終身運動之習慣。

syllabus.zh: 1.課程介紹:瞭解本學期進階有氧舞蹈課程內容與上課進度2.有氧舞蹈基本動作複習:基本舞步複習與肌力訓練以及音樂節奏配合之練習3.進階有氧舞曲(I):  (1)暖身   (2)基本舞步訓練  (3)主動作(每週四個八拍進階舞步組合)  (4)肌力訓練5.緩和4.創意組合動作:期中考試：  (1)舞步之熟練度與團隊默契  (2)創意組動作  (3)服裝5.進階有氧舞曲(II):  (1)暖身   (2)基本舞步訓練  (3)主動作(每週四個八拍進階舞步組合)   (4)肌力訓練  (5)緩和6.創意組合動作:複習期末考試：1. 舞步之熟練度與團隊默契2. 創意組動作3. 服裝
syllabus.en: 1. Course introduction: Understand the content of the advanced aerobic dance and the progress2. Review the basic moves of aerobic dance: reviewing basic steps and strength training 3. Advanced Aerobic Dance music (I):(1) Warm-up (2) Basic steps training (3) Main action (4) Strength training (5) Cool-down/Relaxation 4. Creative combination: mid-term exam:(1) Proficiency of the dance steps and understanding of team tacit (2) Creative moves(3) Costumes5. Advanced Aerobic Dance music (II):(1) Warm-up (2) Basic dance training (3) Main moves (4) Strength training (5) Relaxation6. Creative combination: ReviewFinal exam:1. Proficiency of the dance steps and understanding of team tacit 2. Creative actions3. Costumes

courses.weeklySchedule: 本課程以增強心肺功能，提昇健康體適能為主，因此透過有氧運動的原理，在活動過程，藉由不同轉速的音樂節拍來帶動全身的大肌肉運動，或者結合強度較強或動作較大的流行MV舞蹈，以期望能達到體適能（Physical Fitness）訓練的目的（包括心肺耐力、肌力、肌耐力、增加柔軟度及體脂肪的減少）。    高衝擊有氧舞蹈的內容是由跳躍動作所組成，其能量消耗及衝擊力量與慢跑相似；另外，低衝擊有氧舞蹈的內容由跳躍與搖擺動作組成，運動時的衝擊力量與走路相似，其能量消耗則依舞蹈的型式及技巧而異。這是一項激烈的運動，脊椎有毛病的人，千萬不可輕易嘗試。而且，由於個人體質不同，因此，從事有氧舞蹈運動務必小心體能狀況，看看自己的心臟是否負荷得了。當你做有氧舞蹈時，應注意你的心跳，不能超過一定的頻率。據美國運動醫學大學指出，跳有氧舞蹈時有個安全的心跳上、下限次數，其公式是以二百二十減去你的年齡，然後乘以０點八五（最高）和乘以０點五（最低）求得的結果就是你跳有氧舞時，可以接受的心跳上下限度。因此，假設你是四十歲，那麼，最快的速度每分鐘的心跳約一百五十三次（即(220-40)×O.85=153），亦即每十秒鐘為二十五點五次，最低一分鐘則為九十次（即(220-40)×O.50＝90），亦即每十秒鐘為十五次，這才是既安全又能達到瘦身的範圍之內。　　所以，當你做有氧舞蹈時，不妨用手指接在另一只手的手腕內側，自己把脈查看脈搏的數字是否在上述公式的數據範圍之內，如果低於最低的速率，動作的速度就應稍徵加快，若脈搏的次數超過最高的速率，就應該放慢。總之跳有氧舞蹈時，應掌握由溫和到劇烈的加溫技巧，在快結束時，應有五到十分鐘作為緩衝時間，然後才慢慢停止。運動時萬一出現心跳過速、頭昏、昏厥、盜汗等不正常的徵候時，一定要儘速請教醫生。有氧舞蹈課程內容1、何謂有氧舞蹈？運動與健康、荒謬的減肥方法、身體本質等2、不同風格有氧：以JAZZ FUNCK、Hip Hop、階梯、格鬥或MV舞蹈等為主3、肌肉適能的重要與強化練習4、柔軟度的訓練週 次 日期 課程進度 備 註第 一 週 課程介紹；暖身運動；呼吸與放鬆 第 二 週 低衝擊有氧步法與組合；呼吸與核心控制 第 三 週 低衝擊有氧暖身組合；高衝擊有氧步法與組合 第 四 週 高低衝擊有氧組合 第 五 週 高低衝擊有氧組合變化；腹部、背部肌群訓練 第 六 週 高低衝擊有氧步法與組合；上、下肢肌力訓練 第 七 週 總複習 第 八 週 期中測驗 第 九 週 停課 期中考週第 十 週JAZZ FUNCK步法與組合；柔軟度訓練 第十一週JAZZ FUNCK步法與組合；柔軟度訓練 第十二週JAZZ FUNCK組合變化；整合訓練 第十三週 階梯有氧組合變化；整合訓練 第十四週 階梯有氧組合編創；整合訓練 第十五週 總複習 第十六週 討論與分享 第十七週 期末測驗

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 建立學生對於有氧舞蹈基本認知，進而養成良好及規律性的運動習慣
由舞蹈中養成規律運動終生享受運動樂趣
課程中皆搭配音樂，一方面增強學生對音樂的敏感度，使其提升節奏感，另一方面提升學生聆聽其音樂旋律之美
訓練個人與社會生活上的應用之技能
由舞蹈運動中學習關懷他人培養與他人互動
由舞蹈的欣賞，增進個人美感意境的內涵養成
調劑身心，將有氧舞蹈成為紓壓放鬆之休閒運動
由舞蹈運動中建立及強化互助合作的合群團體意識

courses.referenceBooks: 你運動對了嗎？甘思元臉譜出版2011978-986-120-724-7速效運動麥克‧莫里斯(Dr.Michael Mosley)、佩塔‧畢(Peta Bee)謝佳真 譯2015三采文化
courses.rules: 有氧舞蹈課程注意事項1、有心臟病、高血壓、糖尿病、氣喘等特殊疾病者，請勿上課，預防危險2、請盡量不要遲到，別吃太飽並做好暖身活動，遲到者注意先自行暖身。3、請更換乾淨的運動鞋（有氧鞋或慢跑鞋），以舒適為原則。4、請穿著有彈性的運動服裝。5、這是一項激烈的運動，脊椎有毛病的人，千萬不可輕易嘗試。而且，由於個人體質不同，因此，從事有  氧舞蹈運動務必小心體能狀況，看看自己的心臟是否負荷得了。

courses.description: 本課程為有氧舞蹈之延伸課程，教學目的在於讓學生瞭解有氧舞蹈進階動作之特性並能做出有氧舞蹈進階組合動作與肌力訓練之動作，進而享受有氧舞蹈之樂趣，增進心肺功能與養成其終身運動之習慣。

syllabus.zh: 1.課程介紹:瞭解本學期進階有氧舞蹈課程內容與上課進度2.有氧舞蹈基本動作複習:基本舞步複習與肌力訓練以及音樂節奏配合之練習3.進階有氧舞曲(I):  (1)暖身   (2)基本舞步訓練  (3)主動作(每週四個八拍進階舞步組合)  (4)肌力訓練5.緩和4.創意組合動作:期中考試：  (1)舞步之熟練度與團隊默契  (2)創意組動作  (3)服裝5.進階有氧舞曲(II):  (1)暖身   (2)基本舞步訓練  (3)主動作(每週四個八拍進階舞步組合)   (4)肌力訓練  (5)緩和6.創意組合動作:複習期末考試：1. 舞步之熟練度與團隊默契2. 創意組動作3. 服裝
syllabus.en: 1. Course introduction: Understand the content of the advanced aerobic dance and the progress2. Review the basic moves of aerobic dance: reviewing basic steps and strength training 3. Advanced Aerobic Dance music (I):(1) Warm-up (2) Basic steps training (3) Main action (4) Strength training (5) Cool-down/Relaxation 4. Creative combination: mid-term exam:(1) Proficiency of the dance steps and understanding of team tacit (2) Creative moves(3) Costumes5. Advanced Aerobic Dance music (II):(1) Warm-up (2) Basic dance training (3) Main moves (4) Strength training (5) Relaxation6. Creative combination: ReviewFinal exam:1. Proficiency of the dance steps and understanding of team tacit 2. Creative actions3. Costumes

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 建立學生對於有氧舞蹈基本認知，進而養成良好及規律性的運動習慣
由舞蹈中養成規律運動終生享受運動樂趣
課程中皆搭配音樂，一方面增強學生對音樂的敏感度，使其提升節奏感，另一方面提升學生聆聽其音樂旋律之美
訓練個人與社會生活上的應用之技能
由舞蹈運動中學習關懷他人培養與他人互動
由舞蹈的欣賞，增進個人美感意境的內涵養成
調劑身心，將有氧舞蹈成為紓壓放鬆之休閒運動
由舞蹈運動中建立及強化互助合作的合群團體意識

courses.rules: 期中考佔25%、期末考佔25%、學科佔10%、平時成績佔40%共100%

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 透過桌球運動的正確學習，以正確的運動觀念提升個人的體適能
透過桌球運動技巧的提升，養成終生運動的習慣。
透過桌球運動尋找適合的球伴，以從中培養良好的人際關係
從桌球比賽中培養運動家精神，以利發展健全的人格特質
從桌球運動中養成與他人互動和發展友誼的能力。
經由欣賞桌球比賽，培養對藝術與美的欣賞能力
經由桌球比賽中，訓練個人的情緒管理與抗壓性，進而培養勝不驕敗不餒的運動精神
透過桌球運動培養團隊精神以團體的目標為目標強化團隊的合作精神

courses.referenceBooks: 林明聲編譯(1993)，桌球學習技巧，大坤書局。荻村伊智朗、林清秀著，聯廣圖書公司編譯(1986)，桌球教室，聯廣圖書。
courses.rules: 1.對桌球運動有興趣者。2.須穿著運動服裝、運動鞋準時上下課，無法上課者請自行請假。3.身體若有任何重大或慢性疾病，運動中有任何狀況，請務必告知任課教師。尤其有發燒、咳嗽等症狀，疑似新冠肺炎、流感更應立即通報！4.課堂中注意運動安全，並攜帶礦泉水，隨時補充水分。5.課程中禁止飲食。6.上課認真學習、下課勤於練習。7.常上網、閱讀相關雜誌書籍或觀看轉播以充實相關知識。8.遵守上課規定。

courses.weeklySchedule: 第1週1.課程內容介紹 & 水域安全宣導2.相關規定說明3.成績評量方式說明。4.分組第2週1.複習持拍法、控球練習及發球相關規定2.複習正手擊球、反手推擋3.學習如何發旋轉球、如何接各種旋轉球4.學習扣殺第3週1.學習正、反手發下旋短球，說明發下旋短球易犯錯誤動作。2.發下旋短球重點說明(說明測驗要點)3.分組練習第4週1.複習發下旋短球、正手擊球、反手推擋、左推右攻2.學習搓球3.分組練習第5週  發下旋短球測驗第6週1.複習正手擊球、反手推擋、左推右攻、搓球2.反手推擋重點說明(說明測驗要點)2.學習弧圈球3.分組練習第7週  反手推擋測驗第8週  自由練習第9週  補考與檢討第10週1.複習發下旋短球、搓球、正手擊球、反手推擋、左推右攻、扣殺2.雙打規則講解3.分組練習雙打比賽第11-16週  雙打排名賽第17週  挑戰賽第18週  筆試、檢討及補考

exams.midterm: 術科測驗(下旋短球、反手推擋)
exams.other: 11-16週 雙打排名賽，17週挑戰賽

透過桌球運動技巧的提升，養成終生運動的習慣。
透過桌球運動尋找適合的球伴，以從中培養良好的人際關係

從桌球運動中養成與他人互動和發展友誼的能力。
經由欣賞桌球比賽，培養對藝術與美的欣賞能力
經由桌球比賽中，訓練個人的情緒管理與抗壓性，進而培養勝不驕敗不餒的運動精神
透過桌球運動培養團隊精神以團體的目標為目標強化團隊的合作精神

courses.referenceBooks: 林明聲編譯(1993)，桌球學習技巧，大坤書局。荻村伊智朗、林清秀著，聯廣圖書公司編譯(1986)，桌球教室，聯廣圖書。
courses.rules: 1.對桌球運動有興趣者。2.須穿著運動服裝、運動鞋準時上下課，無法上課者請自行請假。3.身體若有任何重大或慢性疾病，運動中有任何狀況，請務必告知任課教師。尤其有發燒、咳嗽等症狀，疑似新冠肺炎、流感更應立即通報！4.課堂中注意運動安全，並攜帶礦泉水，隨時補充水分。5.課程中禁止飲食。6.上課認真學習、下課勤於練習。7.常上網、閱讀相關雜誌書籍或觀看轉播以充實相關知識。8.遵守上課規定。

courses.description: 1、慢速壘球是結合棒球和壘球比賽型態的一項休閒運動,傳接球容,投手球速緩慢,容易打擊,適合老中清的一項運動2、球賽特性以團隊為主體,可以養成互助合作,以球會友,增進學生之間感情和交流,並提倡正當的休閒運動促進身體健康。

syllabus.zh: 1、短傳球,長傳球,接球,滾地球,高飛球,第一時間反彈球,過頂飛球等練習2、投手投擲練習3、揮打法及推打法兩種擊球方式4、規則研討5、一壘封殺演練6、分組比賽講習規則
syllabus.en: 1 Short pass, long pass, catching, ground ball, high flying ball, overhead flying ball 2 Pitcher throwing practice3 Hitting methods: swing and push 4 Rules discussion5 first base force out drill6 Group competition

courses.weeklySchedule: 一、傳接球，滾地球，高飛球，投手頭擲複習二、推打，揮打，擊球分組練習三、二壘封殺演練四、二壘封殺演練五、遠距投準練習，分組比賽六、遠距投準練習，分組比賽七、遠距投準練習，分組比賽八、壘球投擲考試九、期中考十、分組比賽，熟悉規則十一、分組比賽，熟悉規則十二、分組比賽，熟悉規則十三、打擊練習十四、打擊練習十五、規則研討十六、規則研討十七、體育常識，筆試十八、期末考

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 建構豐富全人健康生活，充實壘球運動概念與技能及專業知識
養成規律運動習慣，將理論與實際結合，融會貫通
培養健康與快樂生活，有條理的表達與溝通，加強積極回應之能力
發展健全人格特質，培養文藝涵養、道德品格
建立尊重與關懷他人之習慣，培養與他人互動和發展友誼的能力
培養文化表達的能力，欣賞創意、運動、藝術，感受生命的力量，得到美的享受
謙虛主動學習新事物，有企圖心，對新環境的應變，有效的調整自我之適應彈性
能與學習夥伴維持良好關係，建立為目標而共同努力的良好互動發揮團體合群意識

courses.referenceBooks: 中華民國慢速壘球協會頒布最新規則慢速壘球相關書籍
courses.rules: 1.上課場地-學校大操場。上課方式:以分組比賽方式取代個人基本動作訓練2選課同學請自備手套、(球棒)帽子3準時到達上課地點、著運動服裝、運動鞋，禁止穿牛仔褲、拖鞋、涼鞋等4上課中禁止滑手機、攜帶食物食用5第一週上課請在三連堂前集合課程評分標準：期中術科測驗:20%期末術科測驗:20%期末筆試;10%-依慢速壘球之規則為出題範圍。平時成績:50%-學生對課程參與度、出缺席、服裝等。(缺席6次以上含6次者，                 以0分計算)

養成規律運動習慣，將理論與實際結合，融會貫通
培養健康與快樂生活，有條理的表達與溝通，加強積極回應之能力
發展健全人格特質，培養文藝涵養、道德品格
建立尊重與關懷他人之習慣，培養與他人互動和發展友誼的能力
培養文化表達的能力，欣賞創意、運動、藝術，感受生命的力量，得到美的享受
謙虛主動學習新事物，有企圖心，對新環境的應變，有效的調整自我之適應彈性
能與學習夥伴維持良好關係，建立為目標而共同努力的良好互動發揮團體合群意識

courses.referenceBooks: 中華民國慢速壘球協會頒布最新規則慢速壘球相關書籍
courses.rules: 1.上課場地-學校大操場。上課方式:以分組比賽方式取代個人基本動作訓練2選課同學請自備手套、(球棒)帽子3準時到達上課地點、著運動服裝、運動鞋，禁止穿牛仔褲、拖鞋、涼鞋等4上課中禁止滑手機、攜帶食物食用5第一週上課請在三連堂前集合課程評分標準：期中術科測驗:20%期末術科測驗:20%期末筆試;10%-依慢速壘球之規則為出題範圍。平時成績:50%-學生對課程參與度、出缺席、服裝等。(缺席6次以上含6次者，                 以0分計算)

courses.description: 1、慢速壘球是結合棒球和壘球比賽型態的一項休閒運動,傳接球容,投手球速緩慢,容易打擊,適合老中清的一項運動2、球賽特性以團隊為主體,可以養成互助合作,以球會友,增進學生之間感情和交流,並提倡正當的休閒運動促進身體健康。

syllabus.zh: 1、短傳球,長傳球,接球,滾地球,高飛球,第一時間反彈球,過頂飛球等練習2、投手投擲練習3、揮打法及推打法兩種擊球方式4、規則研討5、一壘封殺演練6、分組比賽講習規則
syllabus.en: 1 Short pass, long pass, catching, ground ball, high flying ball, overhead flying ball 2 Pitcher throwing practice3 Hitting methods: swing and push 4 Rules discussion5 first base force out drill6 Group competition

courses.weeklySchedule: 第一週~第二週 基本傳接球教學複習第三週~第四週 高飛飛球與滾地球教學與實作第五週~第八週 小組競賽第十週~第十二週 壘球規則講解與實作第十三週~第十七週 分組競賽

courses.rules: 上課期間請穿著合宜的體育服裝，請勿穿牛仔褲、工作褲、休閒褲、拖鞋、涼鞋、靴子等不適宜運動之服裝，違者扣分。請務必準時上課，如無故缺曠課超過三週以上，將給予扣考。如病假、喪假、公假請出示相關證明進行銷假。如有其他相關規定，將會於課堂上再次說明

courses.description: 保齡球是一項適合男女老少的運動，雖然入門極為容易，但想要維持良好成績，必須深入的探討、學習，方能達到預期的水準。而不斷的練習更是促使成績進步的最大動力。在良好的運動環境，及舒適的空間達到休閒健身的目的，是我們想要將該項運動介紹給同學的主要原因。

syllabus.zh: 1.保齡球運動─簡史、場地、球具、規則，及該有的禮儀之介紹。2.持球、助走動作講解。3.下球點及身體延伸動作講解。4.解瓶技巧之介紹。5.直球的介紹。6.飛碟球及其他球種之介紹。
syllabus.en: 1. Bowling – introduction of brief history, venue, equipment, rules, and courtesy 2. Explaining on stance and approaching 3. Explaining on releasing point and body extension 4. Introduction of strike technique.5. Introduction of straight ball.6. Introduction of spinner and other ball release styles.

courses.weeklySchedule: 週別 內容 備註一 1.課程內容介紹2.相關規定說明3.成績評量方式說明 二 直球動作整體連貫與複習。 三 解瓶技巧演練 四 直球動作與解瓶之加強與複習。 五 飛碟球動作之介紹與練習。 六 飛碟球動作的操作與修正。 七 飛碟球基本姿勢的測驗與修正。 八 飛碟球基本姿勢的測驗與修正。 九 補考與討論十 飛碟球基本動作修正後的實際操作。 十一 飛碟球下球點正確與否與球體後段之加速，及球瓶的碰撞關係。 十二 飛碟球之解瓶技巧。 十三 不同球種之分析與討論 十四 術科測驗 十五 術科測驗 十六 術科測驗 十七 術科補考 十八 筆試測驗

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 上課過程中可充實學生健康知識、運動技能與態度進而增加健康體適能
保齡球運動能培養學生運動休閒的習慣，進而養成規律運動，終生享受運動樂趣
保齡球運動能培養學生團隊合作與同儕間的信任的態度，更能訓練學生面對競爭的抗壓性
保齡球運動可訓練學生積極熱忱、合群、守法守紀、不驕不餒的人格特質
保齡球運動中同儕間的互動與鼓勵
保齡球運動可以增進個人美感的養成和欣賞別人支體動作之美感
保齡球運動可培養學生在競爭終如何穩定情緒，讓思緒清晰並增加抗壓力
保齡球運動是個人運動也是團隊運動，可以建立互助合作的團隊意識

courses.referenceBooks: BOURINGU 作者：須田開代子/著 原文作者：KAYOKO SUDA 譯者：彤雲 出版社：益群 出版日期：1996年05月01日二天學會保齡球 作者：馬英傑 出版社：台灣東方
courses.rules: 男、女不拘，但需自備交通工具，於規定時間內到達球館準時上課，並能自行負行車安全責任者。 運動中有任何狀況，請務必告知任課教師。 上課認真學習、下課勤於練習。遵守上課規定。每次上課三局未打完中途因故須離開時，請務必告知任課老師。

courses.rules: 男、女不拘，但需自備交通工具，於規定時間內到達球館準時上課，並能自行負行車安全責任者。 運動中有任何狀況，請務必告知任課教師。 上課認真學習、下課勤於練習。遵守上課規定。每次上課三局未打完中途因故須離開時，請務必告知任課老師。

courses.description: 拳擊運動的發展，歷史久遠，在古代奧林匹克運動會即列為正式的比賽項目。可說是具有傳統的武術競技，但在台灣的發展，卻是參與人數較少的冷門項目。因基本拳種(直、勾、上擊)並不複雜，入門容易，可說是最有效率的格鬪技巧。因此，無論針對男、女同學的防身禦敵，均有直接且立即的幫助，這也是我們想將此項運動介紹，推廣的原因。

syllabus.zh: 1.拳擊運動的簡史、場地、器材、規則之簡介2.選修拳擊需具備的條件和心理素質3.基本動作講解4.直拳介紹(攻擊)5.直拳防禦(防守)6.器材的輔助
syllabus.en: 1. Brief introduction on boxing history, venues, equipment, and rules2. What do you need to have physically and mentally for the boxing class?3. Explanation of Basic movements4. Straight punch (attack)5. Straight punch (defense)6. Auxiliary equipment

courses.weeklySchedule: 第一週：1、本學期課程及預期達成目標之介紹2、重申選課同學需具備條件及各項規定3、上學期選修拳擊課程之心得與檢討第二~四週： 1、複習直拳與防禦動作之交互配合2、直拳與防禦動作之實際操作與模擬演練 第五~七週：1、左、右勾拳介紹與實際演練2、直拳與勾拳之組合與防禦技巧之演練第八週：體育期中測驗：三分鐘沙袋打擊第九週：期中考補考第十~十二週 ：1、上擊拳之介紹與演練 2短拳組合與防禦之模擬演練第十三~十五週：1、長短拳組合及腳步技巧介紹與模擬演練2、全面性攻擊與防禦組合 第十六週：1、成果檢討(本學期各項技巧實務操作與心得檢討)2、筆試 第十七週：期末術科測驗：有條件對打第十八週 期末考補考

exams.midterm: 閃左右直拳打左勾右勾一分鐘
exams.other: 組合拳連續攻擊二分鐘

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 經由拳擊運動的上課，培養學生具備基本的防身技巧，進而增加健康體適能
經由拳擊有氧的介紹與訓練，培養學生作為抒解壓力終生參與的運動項目
在安全無虞的前題下，因對手的差異性，提高該項運動的趣味性，藉此訓練學生面對競爭的抗壓性
拳擊運動，可訓練學生積極熱忱，守法守紀，不驕不餒的人格特質
藉由武術運動習就防身技巧的過程，教育學生體悟一旦出手所帶來的殺傷力是難以掌控的，藉此崇尚武德，養成不輕易與人動武關懷社會的涵養
透過比賽或影片的觀看，瞭解拳擊運動的攻、防技巧，藉由養成欣賞競技運動所散發力與美的感官覺醒
習武首重武德的培養，經由運動訓練的過程抒發壓力，建構優質的情緒管理
同儕間的配合、互動，是攻、防技巧訓練過程中不可或缺的一環，藉由強化互助合作的團隊意識

courses.referenceBooks: 國家A級教練講習手冊 中華民國拳擊協會 100、07、06~100、07、08
courses.rules: 一、上學期未選課同學，因未學習基本動作及左、右直拳，請勿選修本學期進階課程。二、準時出席上課，勿無故缺曠，欲提早離席務必報備。三、按規定穿著運動服裝、攜帶個人器材(手繃帶、牙墊)。四、上課專心聽講，有不明白處務必詢問清楚。五、上課過程務須嚴謹，切忌以開玩笑心態面對。六、愛惜公用器材，勿恣意破壞，否則照價賠償。六、崇尚武德，不輕易與人動手。

courses.description: 拳擊運動的發展，歷史久遠，在古代奧林匹克運動會即列為正式的比賽項目。可說是具有傳統的武術競技，但在台灣的發展，卻是參與人數較少的冷門項目。因基本拳種(直、勾、上擊)並不複雜，入門容易，可說是最有效率的格鬪技巧。因此，無論針對男、女同學的防身禦敵，均有直接且立即的幫助，這也是我們想將此項運動介紹，推廣的原因。

syllabus.zh: 1.拳擊運動的簡史、場地、器材、規則之簡介2.選修拳擊需具備的條件和心理素質3.基本動作講解4.直拳介紹(攻擊)5.直拳防禦(防守)6.器材的輔助
syllabus.en: 1. Brief introduction on boxing history, venues, equipment, and rules2. What do you need to have physically and mentally for the boxing class?3. Explanation of Basic movements4. Straight punch (attack)5. Straight punch (defense)6. Auxiliary equipment

courses.weeklySchedule: 第一週：1、本學期課程及預期達成目標之介紹2、重申選課同學需具備條件及各項規定3、上學期選修拳擊課程之心得與檢討第二~四週： 1、複習直拳與防禦動作之交互配合2、直拳與防禦動作之實際操作與模擬演練 第五~七週：1、左、右勾拳介紹與實際演練2、直拳與勾拳之組合與防禦技巧之演練第八週：體育期中測驗：三分鐘沙袋打擊第九週：期中考補考第十~十二週 ：1、上擊拳之介紹與演練 2短拳組合與防禦之模擬演練第十三~十五週：1、長短拳組合及腳步技巧介紹與模擬演練2、全面性攻擊與防禦組合 第十六週：1、成果檢討(本學期各項技巧實務操作與心得檢討)2、筆試 第十七週：期末術科測驗：有條件對打第十八週 期末考補考

exams.midterm: 閃左右直拳打左勾右勾一分鐘
exams.other: 組合拳連續攻擊二分鐘

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 經由拳擊運動的上課，培養學生具備基本的防身技巧，進而增加健康體適能
經由拳擊有氧的介紹與訓練，培養學生作為抒解壓力終生參與的運動項目
在安全無虞的前題下，因對手的差異性，提高該項運動的趣味性，藉此訓練學生面對競爭的抗壓性
拳擊運動，可訓練學生積極熱忱，守法守紀，不驕不餒的人格特質
藉由武術運動習就防身技巧的過程，教育學生體悟一旦出手所帶來的殺傷力是難以掌控的，藉此崇尚武德，養成不輕易與人動武關懷社會的涵養
透過比賽或影片的觀看，瞭解拳擊運動的攻、防技巧，藉由養成欣賞競技運動所散發力與美的感官覺醒
習武首重武德的培養，經由運動訓練的過程抒發壓力，建構優質的情緒管理
同儕間的配合、互動，是攻、防技巧訓練過程中不可或缺的一環，藉由強化互助合作的團隊意識

courses.referenceBooks: 國家A級教練講習手冊 中華民國拳擊協會 100、07、06~100、07、08
courses.rules: 一、上學期未選課同學，因未學習基本動作及左、右直拳，請勿選修本學期進階課程。二、準時出席上課，勿無故缺曠，欲提早離席務必報備。三、按規定穿著運動服裝、攜帶個人器材(手繃帶、牙墊)。四、上課專心聽講，有不明白處務必詢問清楚。五、上課過程務須嚴謹，切忌以開玩笑心態面對。六、愛惜公用器材，勿恣意破壞，否則照價賠償。六、崇尚武德，不輕易與人動手。

courses.description: 『雕塑優美體態，塑造健美體魄』，認識自我的生理狀態，理解身體、肌肉的特徵與性質，了解關節角度與運動方向，以安全且有效的運動訓練方式達到個人的目標。

syllabus.zh: 1、肌肉的分類2、肌力訓練的原則、種類3、Free Weight4、運動心跳測量與監控5、間歇訓練6、核心肌群（Core Muscles）7、核心訓練8、徒手肌力訓練9、抗力球、藥球、彈力繩、彈力帶10、代謝症候群與代謝疾病11、體適能檢測
syllabus.en: 1 Classification of muscles2 Principles and types of muscle training3 Free Weight4 heart rate measurement and monitoring5 interval training6 Core Muscles (Core Muscles)7 core training8 free hand muscle training9 resistance ball, medicine ball, elastic ropes, elastic bands10 Metabolic syndrome and metabolic diseases11 physical fitness testing

courses.weeklySchedule: 第一週本學期課程進度及上課注意事項第二週發放課程訓練課表第三週健身器材介紹 健身器材使用第四週健身雕塑目標設定 上課紀錄表介紹第五週發放課程訓練課表剖介紹 第六週分組練習第七週分組訓練第八週期中術科考試第九週期中術科考試第十週重量訓練部位組數重量頻率設定第十一週發放課程訓練課表第十二週間歇訓練 高強度間歇訓練第十三週分組訓練第十四週分組訓練第十五週發放課程訓練課表第十六週分組訓練第十七週學科期末考第十八週期末考

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 以健身塑身為目的培養日常運動習慣，建構健康生活
學習自我訂定運動處方能力，有效改善身體是能永續健康照護
正確利用健身輔助器材養成運動休閒技能
提升體能增進正面自我意象自信健全人格特質
藉由運動參與擴大生活圈積極互動，相互關懷
運動休閒及競技欣賞，培養運動賞析能力
運動紓壓自我情緒管理，培養正面思考人生觀
透過小組互動，健身塑身經驗分享交流，強化團體意識

courses.referenceBooks: 1.肌力訓練圖解聖經 作者：DK Publishing出版：旗標出版有限公司 出版日期：2018年10月
courses.rules: 1.準時到達上課地點、著運動服裝、運動鞋，禁止穿牛仔褲、拖鞋、涼鞋等2.上課中禁止滑手機、攜帶食物食用

courses.description: 『雕塑優美體態，塑造健美體魄』，認識自我的生理狀態，理解身體、肌肉的特徵與性質，了解關節角度與運動方向，以安全且有效的運動訓練方式達到個人的目標。

syllabus.zh: 1、肌肉的分類2、肌力訓練的原則、種類3、Free Weight4、運動心跳測量與監控5、間歇訓練6、核心肌群（Core Muscles）7、核心訓練8、徒手肌力訓練9、抗力球、藥球、彈力繩、彈力帶10、代謝症候群與代謝疾病11、體適能檢測
syllabus.en: 1 Classification of muscles2 Principles and types of muscle training3 Free Weight4 heart rate measurement and monitoring5 interval training6 Core Muscles (Core Muscles)7 core training8 free hand muscle training9 resistance ball, medicine ball, elastic ropes, elastic bands10 Metabolic syndrome and metabolic diseases11 physical fitness testing

courses.description: 以敎授哈達瑜珈(Hatha Yoga)為主，包括身體的姿勢、呼吸與放鬆技巧。再加上彼拉提斯(Pilates)所包含的肌力、柔軟度、平衡感與協調性等身體訓練。

syllabus.zh: 頭到腳的暖身操站姿的組合動作坐姿的組合動作跪姿的組合動作臥姿的組合動作放鬆與休息
syllabus.en: Warm-up from head to toeCombination movements of Standing positionCombination movements of sitting position Combination movements of kneeling position Combination movements of prone position Relaxation and resting

courses.weeklySchedule: 第1周:1.介紹課程2.說明上課規範3.講解考試比例第2周:1.呼吸調息2.暖身基本組合小品3.拜日式初級及進階版操練4.緩和放鬆第3周:1.坐姿發展暖身小品2.瑜珈單一訓練以及組合小品訓練(英雄式1 英雄式2 英雄式3 鳩式 樹式 風吹樹式)第4周:1.跪姿發展暖身小品2.瑜珈單一訓練以及組合小品訓練(英雄式1 英雄式2 英雄式3 鳩式 樹式 風吹樹式)第5周:1.瑜珈單一訓練以及組合小品訓練(英雄式1 英雄式2 英雄式3 鳩式 樹式 風吹樹式)第6周:考試組合練習第7周:分組複習第8周:分組考試第9周:分組考試第10周:1.坐姿發展暖身小品2.瑜珈單一訓練以及組合小品訓練(搖擺式+T-pose 椅子式+旋轉 雙人樹式)第11周:1.站姿發展暖身小品2.瑜珈單一訓練以及組合小品訓練(搖擺式+T-pose 椅子式+旋轉 雙人樹式)第12周:1.暖身基本小品2.單一訓練(三角式 拱橋式)第13周:1.暖身基本小品2.將其動作組合成期末考式小品訓練第14周:1.暖身基本小品2.將其動作組合成期末考式小品訓練第15周:考試組合練習第16周:分組練習第17周:期末考第18周:期末考

courses.weeklySchedule: 以敎授哈達瑜珈(Hatha Yoga)為主，包括身體的姿勢、呼吸與放鬆技巧。再加上彼拉提斯(Pilates)所包含的肌力、柔軟度、平衡感與協調性等身體訓練。1.紓解壓力、雕塑身材、促進全身循環代謝。2.身心疾病的預防與改善。3.提高全身肌肉關節的彈性。4.滿足個人健身並引發挑戰自我肢體極限的動力。瑜珈課程內容：1、何謂瑜珈？2、何謂皮（Pilates）拉提斯？3、呼吸法：腹式呼吸4、體位法（Asans）：哈達瑜珈（Hatha Yoga）   頭到腳的暖身操   站姿的組合動作   坐姿的組合動作   跪姿的組合動作   臥姿的組合動作週 次 日期 主要課程進度 備 註第 一 週 課程介紹：暖身運動、呼吸與放鬆 第 二 週 暖身運動、拜日式、站姿組合動作、腹直肌訓練 第 三 週 暖身運動、拜日式、後屈、前屈、腹直肌與背肌訓練 第 四 週 暖身運動、拜日式、後屈、前屈、腹直肌與背肌訓練 第 五 週 暖身運動、拜日式、扭轉動作、腹斜肌訓練 第 六 週 暖身運動、拜日式、扭轉動作、腹斜肌訓練 第 七 週 總複習、討論與分享 第 八 週 期中測驗 第 九 週 停課 期中考週第 十 週 暖身運動、拜日式變化、站立體位法組合、下肢肌力 第十一週 暖身運動、拜日式變化、站立體位法組合、下肢肌力 第十二週 暖身運動、拜日式變化、地板體位法、上肢肌力 第十三週 暖身運動、拜日式變化、地板體位法、上肢肌力 第十四週 暖身運動、拜日式變化、平衡、整合訓練 第十五週 暖身運動、拜日式變化、平衡、整合訓練 第十六週 總複習、討論與分享 第十七週 期末測驗

courses.referenceBooks: 療癒瑜珈解剖書Judy天下雜誌出版社2012978-986-241-484-2內觀瑜珈（結合禪修與中醫的療癒之道）莎拉‧鮑爾斯(Sarah Powers)謝瑤玲 譯橡樹林   978-986-120-648-6動瑜珈  于文惠瑜珈慢慢來瑜珈醫生彼拉提斯塑身新風格
courses.rules: 注意事項：1、要暖身。2、先上廁所再上課。3、飯後1-2小時在練習，運動前後一小時不宜過量進食。4、上課練習中不宜說話。5、注意呼吸順暢。6、有特殊疾病者需詢問醫生。7、要穿著有彈性舒服（吸汗、透氣舒適與合身）的運動服裝。8、練習完20分鐘後再喝溫水。9、生理期最好暫停練習。10、有高血壓、癲癇、心臟病者，不宜有頭倒立或大幅度後彎的動作。11、耳朵與眼睛不舒服要注意有不舒服應馬上休息，順其自然，不可勉強，身體    有不適者，請告知。12、請勿遲到，暖身很重要。13、不應穿著任何鞋襪。

courses.referenceBooks: Judy(2012)。療癒瑜珈解剖書。台北市:天下。
courses.rules: 1、有心臟病、高血壓、糖尿病、氣喘等特殊疾病者，請勿選課，建議改選適應體育班。2、遲到者注意先自行暖身。3、請穿著有彈性的運動服裝，服裝不整一次扣平常成績5分。4、自備開水與毛巾，不得攜帶飲料或食物進入律動教室。5、上課時間嚴禁使用3C用品，如有特殊情形，必須向老師報告，在未經老師許可之下使用3C用品，一次扣平常成績5分。6、上課時間如果要暫時離開教室，必須向老師報告，未經老師許可自行離開教室視同曠課。7、一學期累計缺課六次以上，平時成績以30分計算，缺課六次以上代表請假加上曠課的次數達到六次，包括六次。8、請自備瑜珈墊 彈力帶來上課，若沒有彈力帶的同學，可以先跟老師借用。

courses.referenceBooks: Judy(2012)。療癒瑜珈解剖書。台北市:天下。
courses.rules: 1、有心臟病、高血壓、糖尿病、氣喘等特殊疾病者，請勿選課，建議改選適應體育班。2、遲到者注意先自行暖身。3、請穿著有彈性的運動服裝，服裝不整一次扣平常成績5分。4、自備開水與毛巾，不得攜帶飲料或食物進入律動教室。5、上課時間嚴禁使用3C用品，如有特殊情形，必須向老師報告，在未經老師許可之下使用3C用品，一次扣平常成績5分。6、上課時間如果要暫時離開教室，必須向老師報告，未經老師許可自行離開教室視同曠課。7、一學期累計缺課六次以上，平時成績以30分計算，缺課六次以上代表請假加上曠課的次數達到六次，包括六次。8、請自備瑜珈墊 彈力帶來上課，若沒有彈力帶的同學，可以先跟老師借用。

courses.description: 一、運動復健 賈寶山 老師二、運動瑜珈 徐翠敏 老師

courses.description: This all English class is designed to integrate Taiwan’s heritage, culture, geography and ecology into English language learning. Through class readings, video, and communication exercises students should be able to describe and discuss aspects of Taiwanese culture in English.

syllabus.zh: 本課程使用課堂閱讀題材、影片、課堂活動和簡報讓學生學習如何自信地以英文討論台灣(人)的文化。課前，學生會被要求藉著看一段影片或是完成一篇閱讀來了解問題。除此之外，學生也會有需要做團體簡報以培養其做研究和簡報的技能。1. 外國旅客需要知道台灣的事情(Overview of general knowledge foreign tourists will need in Taiwan)2. 台灣的自然界奇景(Taiwan’s natural wonders)3. 台灣的城市(Taiwan’s cities)4. 廟宇及民間傳說(Temples and folklore)5. 夜市及購物(Night markets and shopping)6. 家族與家庭(Family and home)7. 政府與教育(Government and education)
syllabus.en: Using class readings, videos, communication activities and presentations, students will learn how to discuss aspects of Taiwan and Taiwanese culture more confidently in English.Students will be expected to either watch a weekly video or complete a reading assignment before class with guided questions to assess their understanding. In addition, students will be asked to prepare a group presentation on an assigned topic which will give them practice in both research and presentation skills.The following is a preliminary outline of the topics we will cover over one semester:1. Overview of general knowledge foreign tourists will need in Taiwan.2. Taiwan’s natural wonders.3. Taiwan’s cities.4. Temples and folklore.5. Night markets and shopping.6. Family and home.7. Government and education.In each class students will have the opportunity to practice in guided exercises, role-plays, and free practice. The activities will range from practical tasks such as helping tourists in hotels or on the train, providing guided tours, and explaining the more detailed aspects of Taiwanese society to English speakers.

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 學生將會學習如何以英文討論台灣並了解台灣與其他國家的文化差異
學生將會了解意識到文化差異的不同可以增強國人互助
課堂上的小組討論,角色扮演及簡報和每周的問與答的活動皆可訓練學生的溝通與表達能力
全英授課的課程,學生不只可以增加它們單字量及文法的知識,同時也會提升他們在口說閱讀和聽力的能力

courses.description: 本課程是初級西班牙語，授課對象是對西班牙語言有興趣的學生，無基礎亦可。我們使用的教材有老師編寫的教科書「西班牙語發音」與指定課本ECO：它包含了文法、聽力、閱讀等等的練習。另外一套影片輔助教學教材是＜Viaje al Espanol＞，每一課長度約十五分鐘，配合教學進度於課堂上觀賞學習。
courses.prerequisites:
1. 本課程授課對象是對西班牙語言有興趣的學生，無基礎亦可。
2. 請仔細衡量自己時間，按時上課。

Notes:If you are not a neative speaker of Chinese, please do not select this course.

syllabus.zh: 首先，我們介紹西班牙語發音。本學期學生必須有自信、正確地發音，講出話來，同時熟悉音標，了解如何發出特定的音，認識不同音之間的差別，並能夠判斷他所講的跟聽到的是否合乎標準。其次是西班牙語文法基礎篇: 包括人稱代名詞，現在式、命令式動詞變化，冠詞等。另外，透過觀賞影片＜Viaje al Espanol＞的輔助教學，讓學生實際了解生活中各種不同的情境內容，並增加生活用語的印象，使學生具有開口說西班牙語的能力。一、(1) 初級西班牙語課程導航    (2) 西班牙語字母表A, B, C... 發音。    (3) 西班牙語字母發音與發音規則。    (4) 發音。音標，母音、雙重母音、三重母音。    (5) 基本拼音，不同字母發同樣音，兩個子音組合拼音。    (6) 有些子音的發音，音節(Sílabas)。    (7) 重音規則(Acento)，語調(Entonación)。    (8) 重音規則與重音之有無，連音(Enlace)的練習。    (9) k與g差異，p與b差異，p與v差異，d與t差異。     二、(1) 西班牙語人稱代名詞、反身代詞、    (2) 現在式動詞變化: 規則變化影片教學    (3) 現在式動詞變化: 不規則變化中之規則變化不規則變化。    (4) 現在式動詞變化: 完全不規則變化。          三、(1) 聽力訓練 Para empezar A   (2) 影片教學Viaje al español。四、(1) 國家名稱。    (2) 文法: 陰陽性、單複數，疑問代名詞。    (3) 動詞命令式: Tú / Usted 人稱規則變化。    五、(1) 數字0 – 20    (2) 動詞命令式: Vosotros / Ustedes 人稱規則變化。六、(1) 動詞命令式: Tú / Usted / Vosotros / Ustedes 人稱不規則變化。    (2) 職業    (3) 數字 21 – 100    (4) 數字 0 – 100    (5) 郵件地址念法與書信格式。     七、(1) 疑問句    (2) 口試: 句子、課文朗讀、回答問題。
syllabus.en: 1. Presentacion de la lengua espanola2. Pronunciacion.   - el alfabeto  - la regla de pronunciacion  - sinalefa, acento3. Verbos  - regulares  - irregulares4. Mandato5. El concepto de la singularidad y pluralidad, el masculino y    femenino, la concordancia. 6. Los numeros, decir el tiempo, saludos, presentacion a si    mismo. 7. Interrogación   Segun el texto, introducimos la gramatica del espanol y deseamos que los alumnos entiendan bien los temas que ensenamos y puedan usar lo que han aprendido en la vida cotidiana. Los temas incluyen en la aduana, coger el avion, en el hotel, en el restaurante, de compras, etc. Usamos tambien el video y CDs para practicar la audicion y la conversacion. El proposito es, en todo caso, poder mejorar y perfeccionar su espanol y a la vez, que le guste y le interese hablar esta lengua.

courses.weeklySchedule: (1) 本課程包含線下實體課程及線上磨課師課程「六週輕鬆學，開口說西班牙語」，修課學生須配合課程要求:磨課師課程的期末考試須依實體課的授課時間到實體教室考試。(2) 請確認自己是否能整學期上課。中途有任何原因無法到班上課，請不要要求老師不記曠課。一切依校規處理。(3) 本課程授課對象是從未學過西班牙語的同學，若有學過，想複習者都歡迎選修。另外，選修學生的條件之一:母語是中文，或中文聽說讀寫沒問題者。第一週[面授]-基礎西班牙語 (含磨課師課程)介紹【本週簡介】1.基礎西班牙語_課程介紹 教材:本課程是基礎西班牙語，我們使用的教材有老師編著的「基礎西班牙語文法速成」和文法練習講義。另外，配合影片教學「Viaje al español」與課堂上口說練習，期望學習者在西班牙語 聽說讀寫上能更上一層樓。方式:面授時間:每週四下午12:50-14:40 (六週磨課師課程期間為面授一節課12:50-13:40，遠距磨課師一節)請同學至學聯網點閱「六週輕鬆學，開口說西班牙語」磨課師課程，並按課程規定上傳作業，完成測驗與提出學習上的問題。未完成者曠課一節。第一週1.南臺科大「基礎西班牙語」簡介2.基礎西班牙語課程18週進度表         3.基礎西班牙語課程+磨課師授課方式說明	第二週 面授2hr   西班牙語發音:                              -西班牙語字母表A, B, C... 發音。    -西班牙語字母發音與發音規則。    -音標，母音、雙重母音、三重母音。	第三週 面授2hr   西班牙語發音:                            -k與g差異，p與b差異，p與v差異，d與t差異。    -基本拼音，不同字母發同樣音，兩個子音組合拼音。第四週 面授2hr	   西班牙語發音:                         -有些子音的發音，音節(Sílabas)    -重音規則(Acento)，語調(Entonación)    -重音規則與重音之有無，連音(Enlace)的練習。第五週	面授2hr    課本「基礎西班牙語文法速成」                -人稱代名詞。    -動詞現在式變化:規則+不規則。    -口語練習+課本習題。	第六週  面授2hr    課本「基礎西班牙語文法速成」          -西班牙語疑問代名詞。    -國家、語言。    -口語練習+課本習題。	第七週  面授2hr    課本「基礎西班牙語文法速成」                -冠詞。    -指示代名詞、指示形容詞。    -口語練習+課本習題。	第八週  面授2hr    課本「基礎西班牙語文法速成」          -月、星期、四季。    -肯定命令。    -口語練習+課本習題。	第九週    南臺期中考週第十週  面授1hr +磨課師1hr    MOOCS(磨課師1hr，請參閱第3點)       課本「基礎西班牙語文法速成」    -否定命令。    -口語練習+課本習題。	第十一週  面授1hr +磨課師1hr    MOOCS(磨課師1hr，請參閱第3點)        課本「基礎西班牙語文法速成」    -動詞現在完成式。    -口語練習+課本習題。第十二週	面授1hr +磨課師1hr    MOOCS(磨課師1hr，請參閱第3點)          課本「基礎西班牙語文法速成」    -介系詞。    -口語練習+課本習題。第十三週	 面授1hr +磨課師1hr    MOOCS(磨課師1hr，請參閱第3點)           課本「基礎西班牙語文法速成」    -前置所有格。    -口語練習+課本習題。第十四週	 面授1hr +磨課師1hr    MOOCS(磨課師1hr，請參閱第3點)           課本「基礎西班牙語文法速成」    -後置所有格。    -口語練習+課本習題。	第十五週  面授1hr +磨課師1hr    MOOCS(磨課師1hr，請參閱第3點)            課本「基礎西班牙語文法速成」           -動詞:進行式。    -口語練習+課本習題。	第十六週  面授1hr +磨課師1hr    MOOCS(磨課師1hr，請參閱第3點)            課本「基礎西班牙語文法速成」           -數詞:基數、序數。    -口語練習+課本習題。第十七週	 面授2hr    課本「基礎西班牙語文法速成」           -課程複習。	第十八週 南臺期末考週

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 了解、記憶西班牙語發音、文法。
具備西班牙語聽、說、讀、寫的能力，並將其運用到用個人工作所需。
對西班牙語言、文化能抱持喜歡、欣賞的態度
將西班牙語專業知識使用在就業職場上
熟練、發展英語以外的另一項外國語文
統合學校西班牙語課程所學，未來職場工作、出國旅遊能展現其語言能力，解決生活所遇之問題的能力

    乙次。學習評量中缺曠課，遲到，學習態度等等算一次平時測驗成績。

courses.rules: 1. 必須是從未學過西班牙語的學生且接受老師教學方式與要求。已學過一學期同學建議選修基礎西班牙語會話或進階西班牙語。每週上課點名。2.上課請依規定購買指定教材:基礎西班牙語文法速成，不可使用影印教本以免違反著作權法，亦不可兩人共用一本。3. If you are not a native speaker of Chinese, please do not select this course.4. 依學校規定購買指定用書，不可使用影印教本以免違反著作權法。 5. 請每週上課前務必上網查看Flip Class公佈欄與下載列印講義。6. 缺曠課按校規處理。平時考、期中考、期末考皆含聽力或聽寫測驗。因此，期中考、期末考依規定將提前一週考，請不要缺考，否則以零分計算。7. 請勿以任何形式或工具於課堂上錄影錄音。Flip Class平台上老師上傳之內容、自製講義、錄音皆受智慧財產權與著作權保護，僅止於修習本課程學生課後溫習。嚴禁再將任一內容轉載至任何網站部落格。

courses.description: 本課程授課對象是已學過一學期法語的同學，授課內容除了加強上學期所教過發音規則外，再加入一些特殊發音規則。本課程也針對日常生活情境提供基礎的語法、句型及對話範例讓學生們可以用簡易的法語做溝通及對話。為了使學生能欣賞法國文化及提升語言學習興趣，本課程也對針對法國文化如歷史、風俗民情、飲食、節慶、旅遊及文化活動等方面做重點介紹。
courses.prerequisites: 至少學過法語至少一學期的學生才能選修此課程

syllabus.zh: 一、進階發音練習：特殊規則之發音。二、文法練習：動詞變化、時態應用、連接詞、所有格形容詞、比較級等。三、會話訓練：餐廳用餐、購物、旅遊、文化活動等主題。四、聽力訓練：餐廳用餐、購物、旅遊、文化活動等主題。五、文化介紹：歷史、地理、節慶、藝術、飲食及旅遊等主題。
syllabus.en: 1.Advanced pronunciation practice: special pronunciation rules.2.Grammatical rules: verb conjugation, tense application, conjunctions, possessive adjective, comparatives, etc. 3.Oral practice: topics related to restaurant, dining, shopping, tourism, cultural activities, etc.4.Listening practice: topics related to restaurant, dining, shopping, tourism, cultural activities, etc.5.Cultural aspects: topics related to history, customs, festivals, arts, diet, tourist attraction, etc.

courses.weeklySchedule: Week 1: Review pronunciationWeek 2: National holiday Week 3: Review lesson one and lesson twoWeek 4: Review lesson three and lesson fourWeek 5: Lesson five: PersonalityWeek 6: Lesson six: ObjectWeek 7: Lesson seven: MaisonWeek 8: Lesson seven: Maison+ French cultureWeek 9: MidtermWeek 10: Lesson eight: Ville Week 11: Lesson eight: VilleWeek 12: Lesson Nine: Café+ French culture Week 13: Lesson Nine: Café+ French culture Week 14: Lesson ten: RestaurantWeek 15: Watch and discuss movie clips about French cuisineWeek 16: Watch and discuss movie clips about French cuisineWeek 17: Review and culture quizWeel 18: Final exam

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 使同學能掌握發音規則。
使同學可以用簡單的法語做日常生活的溝通及對話。
介紹法國文化以提高同學的學習興趣。
使同學熟悉文法規則。

courses.description: This is an ESP-orientated communication course that will focus on the English needed for real work situations. We will cover the practical skills and vocabulary needed for a business environment including meetings, presentations, telephone, email and social situations. Students will learn expressions for working and socialising with clients and colleagues in English, practice business writing, and learn how to present key information in different situations.
courses.prerequisites: 備註：本課程為外籍教師授課。

syllabus.zh: The aim of the course is to familiarize students with the skills and vocabulary needed to for a career in international business. In addition they will gain confidence communicating in English in business situations. In class students will use role plays, listen to buisness scenarios, and  carry out authentic tasks. This will be supplemented with authentic reading and listening material. Assessment will involve presentations, role plays and a project task. The course is for students who are considering pursuing a career in business or international sales, but it is also suitable for students wishing to improve their English ability.Topics to be covered:1. Meeting and socialising with clients.2. Dealing with international phone calls and leaving messages.3. Arranging meetings.4. Making presentations.5. Market research.6. Dealing with complaints, job applications, and computer mediated communication (email, skype, social networks etc.)
syllabus.en: The aim of the course is to familiarize students with the skills and vocabulary needed to for a career in international business. In addition they will gain confidence communicating in English in business situations. In class students will use role plays, listen to buisness scenarios, and  carry out authentic tasks. This will be supplemented with authentic reading and listening material. Assessment will involve presentations, role plays and a project task. The course is for students who are considering pursuing a career in business or international sales, but it is also suitable for students wishing to improve their English ability.Topics to be covered:1. Meeting and socialising with clients.2. Dealing with international phone calls and leaving messages.3. Arranging meetings.4. Making presentations.5. Market research.6. Dealing with complaints, job applications, and computer mediated communication (email, skype, social networks etc.)

courses.weeklySchedule: This is an ESP (English for Specific Purposes) course at the pre-intermediate level with a focus on speaking. We will look at various business/office-related topics in the course, including handling job interviews, talking about abilities and work experience, taking telephone messages and orders, and describing company structure and performance. Role play activities will be used to allow students to practice key vocabulary, and students will do a mock job interview for the mid-term and a business presentation for the final.

teachingAndAssessment.objective: Complete assignments on time, come to class prepared and encourage team work.
Communicate with the classmates and teacher during the class activities, and be willing to try to express ideas in English.
Learn the basics of business communication and show improvement throughout the semester.
Gain familiarity with using power point and the internet for presentions.
introduce new ideas in presentations, improvise in role plays, be creative in assignments.

courses.referenceBooks: Useful Links: BBC Business English (video lessons on various topics): https://www.bbc.co.uk/learningenglish/business-english BBC English at Work (workplace conversations/dialogues): https://www.bbc.co.uk/learningenglish/english/features/english-at-work/ Oxford Business English (video-based lessons on various topics): https://www.oxfordonlineenglish.com/free-business-english-lessons

courses.description: This class is offered due to the demand our students have for TOEIC test preparation. It is a basic class, helping students to get a good overview of the test and practice in the key areas of reading and listening. The goal is to help students crack the 700 mark on the test or higher. As TOEIC is looked at by many companies, including airlines and trading companies this is important for future graduates.

syllabus.zh: 本課程為多益測驗聽力與閱讀的準備課程。課程重點為多益題目練習，並教授如何增進英語聽力與閱讀能力。
syllabus.en: The course will cover all aspects of TOEIC test preparation. A text book will be used. There will be a focus on practice tests and in class explanation of how to improve both listening and reading.

courses.weeklySchedule: Week 1 IntroductionWeek 2 TOEIC practice and anylysis (I-1)Week 3 TOEIC practice and anylysis (I-2)Week 4 TOEIC practice and anylysis (I-3)Week 5 TOEIC practice and anylysis (I-4)Week 6 TOEIC practice and anylysis (I-5)Week 7 TOEIC practice and anylysis (I-6)Week 8 ReviewWeek 9 Mid-termWeek 10 TOEIC practice and anylysis (II-1)Week 11 TOEIC practice and anylysis (II-2)Week 12 TOEIC practice and anylysis (II-3)Week 13 TOEIC practice and anylysis (II-4)Week 14 TOEIC practice and anylysis (II-5)Week 15 TOEIC practice and anylysis (II-6)Week 16 TOEIC practice and anylysis (II-7)Week 17 ReviewWeek 18 Final

teachingAndAssessment.objective: Students will be expected to utilise English during class
Students will be expected to participate and learn how to manage time during their test.
This class as a strong focus on preparing for the TOEIC test and aims to give a strong background in the testing methodology.
Integration and innovation comes from students outside reading of materials that will benefit the business related questions in the TOEIC test

courses.rules: 本課程僅適合對於"英語學習"以及"多益證照"具有高度興趣與意願的學習者選修。課堂內容包含大量題庫演練，解題技巧分析。學習者必須具備"主動參與課堂演練"的積極度，並且投入大量時間練習考古題。本課程為選修課, 修課人數上限皆依照校方規範, 額滿後不再開放加簽, 請勿再來信詢問。若因額滿而未能選到此課程但仍有強烈修課意願者, 可於第一週課堂自行到教室現場。聽完課程首週內容介紹後, 再決定是否適合自己的學習需求。第一週加退選期間通常會釋出少許名額, 請同學自行在系統上把握這些名額.  本課程從開學第二週起, 不再開放旁聽。欲修習本課程者, 務必使用正版教科書。為維護課堂品質, 請學習者準時, 並保持基本禮節。

It is a basic class, helping students to get a good overview of the test and practice in the key areas of reading and listening. The goal is to help students crack the 700 mark on the test or higher. As TOEIC is looked at by many companies, including airlines and trading companies this is important for future graduates.

syllabus.zh: 本課程為多益測驗聽力與閱讀的準備課程。課程重點為多益題目練習，並教授如何增進英語聽力與閱讀能力。
syllabus.en: The course will cover all aspects of TOEIC test preparation. A text book will be used. There will be a focus on practice tests and in class explanation of how to improve both listening and reading.

teachingAndAssessment.objective: Students will be expected to utilise English during class
Students will be expected to participate and learn how to manage time during their test.
This class as a strong focus on preparing for the TOEIC test and aims to give a strong background in the testing methodology.
Integration and innovation comes from students outside reading of materials that will benefit the business related questions in the TOEIC test

courses.description: This preparatory course will further give the students the opportunity to involve consonant and extensive vocabulary learning (cluster consonant and leader consonant). To develop the students' speaking skills to enable them to use general, social and professional language (daily life communication ) This approach helps students in the lower-level groups to achieve the needed competence and students in the more advanced groups to perfect their knowledge of Thai.

courses.description: This course aims to enable Taiwanese students to acquire intermediate communication skills. The course will focus on speaking, listening and reading skills as well as vocabulary, grammar and pronunciation.The course is designed for any student who is Intermediate level or above and who intends to use Vietnamese at work. Class concentrates on Vietnamese used in business and commercial situations and is relevant to junior business people as well as students who do not yet have any work experience.

courses.description: The intermediate course of Indonesia Language provides learners with the skills needed on using basic language which is adequate for short communication on daily life. The syllabus content is organized around 2 broad topic areas, which provide contexts for the acquisition of vocabulary and the study or grammar and structures. The topic areas are everyday activities and around personal and social life.

courses.description: 本課程授課對象是從未學過俄文的同學。選用的教材是初級俄語。它包含了：會話、聽力、文法、閱讀等內容及由俄羅斯權威語音學家所錄製的兩片CD。每課均配合實用的練習題。

courses.description: 藉由準備考試，學習英語詞彙、句法和連貫性等文法慨念，以及利用上下文線索推測英語字義或句意的能力。讓學生練習理解日常生活常見英文資訊（如圖表、廣告、告示和短文等）之主旨和細節，並整合應用相關訊息作推論和解讀的能力。

syllabus.zh: 幫助學生理解日常生活及校園情境常見之英語對話及言談之主旨和細節，並根據語境特徵進行推論以及解讀說話者言外之意的能力。測驗考生理解英文短文、書信、告示或廣告之主旨和細節，以及整合應用文章資訊作推論和解讀作者立場的能力。
syllabus.en: 1.Students will be able to comprehend English conversations on day-to-day topics.2.Students will have the ability to use simple English sentences to describe common objects and events, converse with others, and engage in group discussions.3.Students will demonstrate competence in reading short English essays, personal letters, advertisements, and the like.4.Students will acquire skills to write short English essays and personal letters.5.Students will develop critical thinking skills in order to prepare for and deliver professional oral presentations in English by summarizing key information in list format.

courses.weeklySchedule: 本測驗旨在評量考生於一般日常生活及校園情境中使用英語聽讀能力。測驗依難易程度分為兩級：第一級適合具基礎至中等英語程度的考生；第二級適合中等至進階英語程度的考生。1課程介紹  csept 測驗2第一回聽力測驗 解說 3第一回閱讀 綜合測驗 測驗 解說4第二回聽力解說 5第二回閱讀綜合測驗 測驗 解說 6 聽力+閱讀測驗  課外補充 7 第三回 聽力測驗 解說8第三回 閱讀 綜合測驗 測驗 解說9 期中考試10 考試題目解說11第四回聽力 測驗 解說12 第四回閱讀 綜合測驗 解說13 第五回 聽力 測驗 解說14 第五回 閱讀 綜合測驗  解說15 課外補充閱讀  單字16 level 2 第一回聽力17 level 2 第一回閱讀 18 期末考試

具備中文、人文藝術、社會科學及自然科學的基本知能，並強化科學素養
能應用多元外語於各科學習，展現自己對國際、文化的理解，並能適切因應地球村及國際化趨勢。
有組織、有條理的表達與溝通，能表現出應對進退的適當禮節，專注聆聽交談對象的說話內容，並給予積極回應之能力。

courses.description: The aim of this course is to enhance students’ listening and speaking abilities in everyday situations. Relevant grammar, culture issues and vocabulary will be covered in the course so as to prepare students to communicate in English for work, travel and everyday life.

syllabus.zh: 學生將依照以下情境進行英語聽講訓練:1.	解釋並描述娛樂活動2.	於購物場所進行溝通3.	描述職場相關工作4.	描述電腦使用的相關步驟5.	描述旅遊的計畫6.	使用適當的詞彙完成餐廳訂位7.	使用適當的詞彙要求飯店服務8.	描述交通工具與使用方法9.	討論環境保護的相關議題10.	描述駕駛習慣11.	描述居家的相關細節12.	討論健康的相關議題
syllabus.en: Students will develop listening and speaking ability in English in the following contexts:1.	Learn how to describe and explain about entertainment events2.	Learn how to communicate when you go shopping3.	Talk about what people are doing in an office4.	Talk about how to use computers5.	Talk about how to plan a trip6.	Learn how to make restaurant reservations7.	Learn how to request hotel services8.	Talk about the transportation you usually take and how to use it9.	Learn to talk about ways to protect the environment10.	Talk about driving habits11.	Talk about the type of house you live in12.	Talk about how to stay fit and healthy

courses.description: 本課程幫助學生建立能正確書寫英文句子，進而針對特定主題書寫英文段落來表達個人觀點。This is a writing course to help students develop sentences to form paragraphs in order to participate in EMI classes. Students will develop and link a variety of English sentences to form a simple cohesive paragraph, write realistic short writing assignments and gain self-editing experience.

syllabus.zh: 1.	英文基本詞類介紹。2.	基本句型介紹。3.	文章選讀與文法分析。4.	英文修辭訓練。
syllabus.en: 1.	Introduction to basic parts of speech in English.2.	Introduction to basic sentence patterns.3.	Articles readings and grammar analyses.4.	English rhetoric training.

courses.weeklySchedule: Weekly Schedule 每週進程W1 02/23  Course Introduction: Syllabus + 兩段式寫作示範(G: Determiners and Articles A) W2 03/01  兩段式寫作修改練習 (G: Determiners and Articles B)  W3 03/08  Unit 5 Telling the Story + Unit 4 Food, Glorious Food (G: Determiners and Articles C)W4 03/15  八大句型 (G: Subject-Verb Agreement A)W5 03/22  Unit 5 Telling the Story (G: Subject-Verb Agreement B)  W6 03/29  Unit 5 Telling the Story + 八大句型 (G: Compound Sentence A)  W7 04/05  Makeup Holiday: NO CLASS   W8 04/12  作文5-1 (線上)  (G: Compound Sentence B)  W9 04/19  Midterm Exam (no essay) + Peer Editing (交PE.5-1) W10 04/26 Unit 6 Writing a Summary and Response  (交5-2) (G: Present Simple VS Present Continuous)W11 05/03 Unit 6 Writing a Summary and Response  (還5-2) (G: Past Simple A) W12 05/10 Unit 6 Writing a Summary and Response (交5-3) (G: Past Simple B)W13 05/17 作文6-1 (線上) (交5-3)  (G: Past Continuous)W14 05/24 Peer Editing (交PE.6-1) + Unit 4 Food, Glorious Food  (G: Past Simple VS Past Continuous)W15 05/31 Unit 4 Food, Glorious Food  (交6-2) (G: Present Perfect A)W16 06/07 Unit 4 Food, Glorious Food (還6-2) (G: Present Perfect B)W17 06/14 Review   (交6-3) (G: Past Simple VS Present Perfect)W18 06/21 Final Exam Week (with essay)  (交6-3)

增進以英語文法、字彙及寫作等能力

courses.description: 本課程幫助學生建立能正確書寫英文句子，進而針對特定主題書寫英文段落來表達個人觀點。This is a writing course to help students develop sentences to form paragraphs in order to participate in EMI classes. Students will develop and link a variety of English sentences to form a simple cohesive paragraph, write realistic short writing assignments and gain self-editing experience.

syllabus.zh: 1.	英文基本詞類介紹。2.	基本句型介紹。3.	文章選讀與文法分析。4.	英文修辭訓練。
syllabus.en: 1.	Introduction to basic parts of speech in English.2.	Introduction to basic sentence patterns.3.	Articles readings and grammar analyses.4.	English rhetoric training.

courses.weeklySchedule: Week 1: Learn about compound sentences 2. Learn to write compound sentences about bad habits. Week 2: Put compound sentences together to form a paragraph. Learn to correct verb tense errors. Write about bad habits on social media. Week 3: Learn about complex sentences and future careers. Learn to write complex sentences about future careers.Week 4: Learn to connect complex sentences into a paragraph. Learn to correct verb tense errors. Write about future careers on social media.Week 5: Learn about complex sentences 2. Learn to write complex sentences about video games. Week 6: Learn to connect complex sentences 2 into a paragraph. Learn to correct run-on sentences and comma splices. Research and write about a school called ‘quest to learn’ on Facebook.Week 7: Learn about making questions. Learn to ask and answer questions about smartphones in writing. Week 8: Learn to connect questions and answers into a paragraph. Learn to correct sentence fragments. Take an online quiz about smartphone addiction and discuss the results on social media.Week 9: Midterm exam: in-class writing test& grammar test Week 10: Learn about making questions 2. Learn to ask and answer more questions about peer pressure in writing.Week: 11: Learn to connect questions 2 into a paragraph. Learn to write and correct direct and indirect questions. Research and write about peer pressure in social media.Week 12: Learn about passive sentences. Learn to write passive sentences about relationships and dating. Week 13: Learn to connect passive sentences to make a paragraph. Learn to correct the subject of a sentence. Research and discuss the best age to get married on social media. Week 14: Writing practice and consultation: topic sentences.Week 15: Writing practice and consultation: supporting ideas.Week 16: Writing practice and consultation: linking phrases.Week: 17: Writing practice and consultation: concluding sentences.Week 18: Final exam: in-class writing test& grammar test

Week 14: Writing practice and consultation: topic sentences.Week 15: Writing practice and consultation: supporting ideas.Week 16: Writing practice and consultation: linking phrases.Week: 17: Writing practice and consultation: concluding sentences.Week 18: Final Exam- Writing test ( in-class) & Grammar test

courses.description: 本課程幫助學生建立能正確書寫英文句子，進而針對特定主題書寫英文段落來表達個人觀點。This is a writing course to help students develop sentences to form paragraphs in order to participate in EMI classes. Students will develop and link a variety of English sentences to form a simple cohesive paragraph, write realistic short writing assignments and gain self-editing experience.

syllabus.zh: 1.	英文基本詞類介紹。2.	基本句型介紹。3.	文章選讀與文法分析。4.	英文修辭訓練。
syllabus.en: 1.	Introduction to basic parts of speech in English.2.	Introduction to basic sentence patterns.3.	Articles readings and grammar analyses.4.	English rhetoric training.

courses.description: 本課程為第二學期的自主學習課程。學生將從本課程習得自主學期英語技能的能力與習慣。This course is designed to help students get ready for bilingual courses. Students will work on developing self-learning skills to English learning.

syllabus.zh: 自主學習素材: 針對聽力單字文法以及閱讀的學習給予每周固定學習的素材，學生須自行上網學習並做學習筆記。檢核表:針對每周所習得的字彙或文法句型等內容給予檢核表，以檢視並記錄所習得的知識。並發掘自學時無法理解的問題與內容以待輔導老師解惑。測驗:以每周學習內容為基底給予學生簡短的測驗以檢視學習成效。輔導與學習歷程追蹤:以flipclass平台資料以及檢核表追蹤學生學習狀況。開課老師會針對學生狀況給予每學期不少於四次的學習輔導與諮詢。並視情況給予必要的協助或輔導資源。
syllabus.en: Self-learning materials:English learning materials regarding grammar, reading, vocabulary, and listening skills will be offered for students to study by schedule. Review form:For each week, students are required to complete a form to review their learning process and to discover possible questions when learning on their own. Tests:Tests based on each week’s learning material are required for students to examine their performance. Consultation & TutoringAbove information will be reviewed by teachers for further consultation and tutoring for students to strengthen their learning. Each student will receive no less than four times a semester.

courses.weeklySchedule: WK1: course introductionWK2-3: self-learning material (1) + review form (1) WK4-5: self-learning material (2) + review form (2) WK6-7: self-learning material (3) + review form (3) WK8-9: self-learning material (4) + review form (4) WK10-11: self-learning material (5) + review form (5)  WK12-13: self-learning material (6) + review form (6) WK14-15: self-learning material (7) + review form (7) WK16-17: self-learning material (8) + review form (8) WK18: final exam (oral report)

以自主學習習得的英語技能再進階的雙語課程裡做表達與溝通
增進英語聽講、文法、閱讀、字彙等等的能力
利用網路資源以及相關軟體提升自主學習的興趣及英語學習的知識管理。
整合所需學習的素材以及歸納所習得的知識來進行更進階的學習。

courses.description: 仿托福題目演練方式展開校園英語對話，以南臺科大校園食、衣、住、行、育、樂為主軸的談話、訪談與討論。This course aims to train students as effective observers and speakers for situation talks; that is, there will be topic based conversation, interview, and discussion for food, clothing, residence, transport, education & entertainment on campus of STUST.

syllabus.zh: 1.讓學生具備英語溝通的能力與技巧2.學生能自然地對在地生活與文化做出回應與反思
syllabus.en: 1. To equip students with communication skills. 2. To respond naturally on issues of the day and local culture.

To be able to describe and report issues or news in English
To be able to make a proposal on organizing a club or holding festival activities on campus

courses.rules: As this is a course for USR at Shennong Street this semester, after 2 field trips, students are required to cooperate with their team members for a project helping the community, and then are expected to make their outcome presentations at the end of this semester.

courses.description: This is the second semester of a two semester program designed to help students get ready for studying abroad. Students will work on improving their academic speaking, listening, reading and writing skills.

syllabus.zh: 本課程主要加強同學英文檢定考試的英文能力；聽－針對考試聽力訓練、訓練學生將聽力應用到短篇作文說－兩人練習、訓練學生表達意見與喜好讀－長篇學術文章閱讀、快速重點閱讀技巧寫－看圖表寫作、文法加強單字－建立廣泛的單字能力定期給予學生模擬測驗，追蹤學生的進步幅度
syllabus.en: Listening*Real life listening practices which teach students to listen for context*Timed listening practices where students practice listening for main ideas and details.*Practice listening to lectures (5+ minutes)*Learning to listen for signaling in lecture language*Simulated (IELTS)listening tests.Speaking*Pair work and small group discussions which focuses on specific test questions.*Extensive practice expressing, explaining and giving reasons for opinions and preferences.*Oral presentations that teach students how to organize topics.*Simulated (IELTS) speaking tests.Reading*Intensive reading of medium-length academic passages*Training in skimming and scanning*Training in reading strategies such as surveying, predicting, and summarizing*Training in how to recognize unknown vocabulary from context*Simulated reading testsWriting*General grammar instruction*Training on thought development in order to be able to logically express an opinion in writing*Instruction and practice on describing graphs, charts, tables, maps, and diagrams in written English*Practice writing in a timed atmosphere*Frequent writing homework assignments*Simulated (IELTS) writing tests

courses.weeklySchedule: This skills-based course is designed to help students improve their test-taking skills, specifically those required to do well on the IELTS test. Authentic test materials will be used to explore a variety of topics (e.g. travel, business, environment), allowing students to familiarize themselves with test format and acquire relevant vocabulary. Students will learn how to express opinions, discuss topics at length, and compose both academic reports and opinion essays as is required in the IELTS test. Regular simulated tests will help students track their progress.Materials for this course will be provided. No textbook required.

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 學習如何在正式與非正式場合與人互動
學習積極參與課程及與人合作
學習以英語溝通
學習如何談論工作相關主題

courses.referenceBooks: Useful links: www.bbc.co.uk/worldservice/learningenglish (great for practicing various aspects of ESL); https://www.abc.net.au/education/learn-english/study-english-ielts-preparation/7568250 (great website for speaking style questions and grammar activities); http://learnenglish.britishcouncil.org (provides information about all aspects of learning English and studying in the UK); http://www.ielts.org/ (the official website for IELTS); http://www.englishcentral.com/ (great for practicing listening skills); http://www.ielts-blog.com/ (great for looking at the type of mistakes students often make in IELTS writing); http://www.breakingnewsenglish.com/ (good website for contemporary news with an excellent vocab section).

courses.description: This course aims to help students expand vocabulary, develop reading skills and reading comprehension through reading a wide variety of articles related to our local cultures; meanwhile, students can link the reading texts to practice writing skills and are able to write at least two-paragraph long cohesive essays. By revising the drafts of their own writing, students will also gain self-editing experience. Since the reading texts are related to the local history and cultures of Taiwan, this course also prepares the students to become a global citizen with the perspectives of glocalization as well as consciousness of Taiwanization.

syllabus.zh: 1.幫助學生熟悉英文閱讀技巧,例如根據上下文判斷字義。2.培養獨立閱讀英文文章之能力,例如如何掌握文章大意。3.閱讀不同類型的文章,強化學生辨識文章組織結構之能力。4.使學生熟悉英文寫作不同文體的寫作策略。5.引導學生認識台灣歷史與文化，養成深具台灣主體意識兼具世界觀的公民。
syllabus.en: 1.To familiarize students with English reading skills, such as getting meanings of the words from context2.To develop students’ abilities to read English texts independently, such as understanding the main idea3.To help students read different types of texts and to enhance their abilities of identifying the text structure4.To familiarize students with writing strategies of different genres5.Guide students to learn about Taiwanese history and cultures to raise students’ awareness of Taiwanization as well as becoming a global citizen with the perspectives of glocalization.

teachingAndAssessment.objective: Discussion / learning topics from different disciplines, and moral themes related to modern society.
Students will have classroom discussions, work in groups, and complete assignments.
Students will communicate orally with one another in a relaxed environment.
Students will develop English reading and writing skills.
Students will use online resources to write, collaborate and edit written work.
Students will learn how to integrate with others via oral communication.

courses.referenceBooks: www.bbc.co.uk/worldservice/learningenglish - This is a great site for practicing numerous aspects of EFL.  There are lots of interesting stories, self-tests, vocabulary building exercises, and interactive activities.  Be aware that the accents and some of the idioms will be British English.  However, it’s interesting and easy to use.  You can even learn English in Mandarin!  But that would be like cheating.https://www.grammarly.com . Great website for correcting simple grammar mistakes.https://translate.google.com/   Essential for vocabulary and simple sentence making.https://www.oxfordlearnersdictionaries.com/     The best online dictionary for language learners.https://www.synonym.com/  Improve the variety of your vocabulary with this great website.https://www.macmillandictionary.com/browse/collocations/british/b/#words A good collocation dictionary for studentshttps://www.english-corpora.org/coca/ The BEST collocation collection but it is more difficult to use.

courses.description: The aim of this course is to develop students’ listening and speaking skills needed in a wide range of social and cultural situations. Relevant grammar, culture issues and vocabulary will be covered in the course so as to prepare students to express their opinions effectively in English in different social and academic contexts.

syllabus.zh: 學生將依照以下情境進行英語聽講訓練:1.全球問候禮儀2.亞洲節慶3.柬埔寨的塗鴉文化4.家事5.亞洲藝術節慶6.世界旅遊7.國際食物與餐桌禮儀8.健康與健身9.時尚與服裝10.電腦科技與發明11.電影12.友誼
syllabus.en: Students will develop listening and speaking ability in English in the following contexts:1.Greetings around the world2.Interesting festivals in Asia3.Ancient graffiti discovered in Cambodia4.Housework5.The Asia Art Festival6.Travel7.International food and table manners8.Health and Fitness9.Fashion and Clothing10.Computer Technology11.Movies12.Friendship

courses.weeklySchedule: We will follow our course text looking at a variety of topics, including Business and Finance. There will be a focus on Listening and Speaking. The grading policy for this course will be Attendance and Participation 40%, Mid-Term 30% (15% Writing Paper; 15% Oral Exam); and Final 30% (15% Writing Paper; 15% Oral Exam).

teachingAndAssessment.objective: To be able to appreciate the culture of different countries
To be able to speak sensibly and listen carefully in group discussions
To be able to convey messages concisely and clearly
To develop confidence in public speaking.
To be able to communicate in English effectively
To be able to research on a topic and think critically

courses.description: 本課程為第四學期的自主學習課程。學生將從本課程習得自主學期英語技能的能力與習慣，目標為協助學生學習自主學習英語技巧的習慣與能力。並訓練學生能對自我學習的內容加以規劃、篩檢資料、檢視學習成果並活用習得的技能。以期學生能將英語學習內化為終生並能自主學習的習慣。

syllabus.zh: (一)自主學習素材: 針對聽力單字文法以及閱讀的學習給予每周固定學習的素材，學生須自行上網學習並做學習筆記。(二)檢核表:針對每周所習得的字彙或文法句型等內容給予檢核表，以檢視並記錄所習得的知識。並發掘自學時無法理解的問題與內容以待輔導老師解惑。(三)測驗:以每周學習內容為基底給予學生簡短的測驗以檢視學習成效。(四)輔導與學習歷程追蹤:以flipclass平台資料以及檢核表追蹤學生學習狀況。開課老師會針對學生狀況給予每學期不少於四次的學習輔導與諮詢。並視情況給予必要的協助或輔導資源。
syllabus.en: Self-learning materials:English learning materials regarding grammar, reading, vocabulary, and listening skills will be offered for students to study by schedule. Review form:For each week, students are required to complete a form to review their learning process and to discover possible questions when learning on their own. Tests:Tests based on each week’s learning material are required for students to examine their performance. Consultation & TutoringAbove information will be reviewed by teachers for further consultation and tutoring for students to strengthen their learning. Each student will receive no less than four times a semester.

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 以閱讀社會關懷以及人文、藝術、歷史文化背景相關素材學習英語表達溝通技能。
以自主學習習得的英語技能再進階的雙語課程裡做表達與溝通
增進英語聽講、文法、閱讀、字彙等等的能力
利用網路資源以及相關軟體提升自主學習的興趣及英語學習的知識管理。
整合所需學習的素材以及歸納所習得的知識來進行更進階的學習。

courses.rules: 本課程重視自主學習精神與實作，請按規定時程完成相關任務。閱讀素材: 6篇 心智圖製作: 6篇 (60%=10%x6)期末報告: 短簡報介紹其中一篇素材(錄影) 40%(簡報檔:10% /講稿10%/ performance 20%)(須背稿錄製，2-3分鐘為限。需露臉及半身入鏡。)

syllabus.zh: (一)自主學習素材: 針對聽力單字文法以及閱讀的學習給予每周固定學習的素材，學生須自行上網學習並做學習筆記。(二)檢核表:針對每周所習得的字彙或文法句型等內容給予檢核表，以檢視並記錄所習得的知識。並發掘自學時無法理解的問題與內容以待輔導老師解惑。(三)測驗:以每周學習內容為基底給予學生簡短的測驗以檢視學習成效。(四)輔導與學習歷程追蹤:以flipclass平台資料以及檢核表追蹤學生學習狀況。開課老師會針對學生狀況給予每學期不少於四次的學習輔導與諮詢。並視情況給予必要的協助或輔導資源。
syllabus.en: Self-learning materials:English learning materials regarding grammar, reading, vocabulary, and listening skills will be offered for students to study by schedule. Review form:For each week, students are required to complete a form to review their learning process and to discover possible questions when learning on their own. Tests:Tests based on each week’s learning material are required for students to examine their performance. Consultation & TutoringAbove information will be reviewed by teachers for further consultation and tutoring for students to strengthen their learning. Each student will receive no less than four times a semester.

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 以閱讀社會關懷以及人文、藝術、歷史文化背景相關素材學習英語表達溝通技能。
以自主學習習得的英語技能再進階的雙語課程裡做表達與溝通
增進英語聽講、文法、閱讀、字彙等等的能力
利用網路資源以及相關軟體提升自主學習的興趣及英語學習的知識管理。
整合所需學習的素材以及歸納所習得的知識來進行更進階的學習。

courses.description: In the roundtable discussion, students will have to assert their ideas and debate with others on a specific topic in English. Moreover, students will also cultivate the ability of analyzing information and expressing viewpoints for further exploration and discussion.藉由分組討論特定議題的方式，來強化學生聽講英語的能力。學生必須以英語主導討論的進行以及學習以英語闡述意見與分析論述的技巧

syllabus.zh: 一 分組決定討論的組別二 選擇欲進行的素材內容以及可供討論的問題。並須在課前繳交相關的計畫內容。三 進行討論並輪流擔任桌長以引導討論。四 針對同學發表討論內容作同儕互評。
syllabus.en: 1.Grouping for discussion2.Choose topics for discussions and hand in projects about questions to lead discussion before the class starts. 3.Take turns to lead the discussions in class. 4.Do peer review after the discussion is done.

courses.rules: 課程目的: 希望學生經由圓桌討論議題的方式,練習以英語收集資訊,歸納資料,並表達自己的意見與觀點。並與他人做意見交流與思辯。執行方式:1 先講授進行圓桌討論時所需要的句型與技巧2 分組已規劃討論進行的方式與角色(輪流扮演討論裡的6個角色)3 進行討論 (共6次, 6人一組,每次20分鐘)4 檢討回顧討論的得失並做同儕互評規則1 桌長領導討論!每人須輪流扮演角色2 討論過程需錄音繳交給老師作評量成績的依據!每次桌長負責執行錄音及繳交的任務3 每次討論完需填寫討論後心得以檢視自己及同學的表現 (中文即可)評分標準出席:16%討論參與度 48% (8%x6)討論講稿 36%(6%x6)

courses.description: 學生將學習何為社會創新與永續管理，及如何應用於生活中。學生將了解永續管理的意義及重要性，並學習支持全球發展議程的創新解決方案。In this course, students will know what are social innovation and sustainability, and how to use them in real life. Students will understand the meaning and significance of sustainability and learn about innovative solutions for supporting the global development agenda.

syllabus.zh: 1,永續發展與人類福址2. 永續資源3. 永續工程4. 永續化學5. 永續科學6. 永續產業
syllabus.en: 1.	Sustainability and wellbeing2.	Sustainable resources3.	Sustainable engineering4.	Sustainable chemistry5.	Sustainable science6.	Sustainable industries

courses.weeklySchedule: Teachers will present topics related to various aspects of this field. Handouts will be provided.Week 1. Music ElementsWeek 2. Music Form -VariationWeek 3. From Past to Morden-The sustainable development of musicWeek 4. Scientific Methods (1)Week 5. Scientific Methods (2)Week 6. Group Oral PresentationWeek 7. Loose parts and global protectionWeek 8. Loose parts creationWeek 9. Group oral reportWeek 10. SDG 13 Climate ActionWeek 11. SDG 15 Life On LandWeek 12. SDG 14 Life Below WaterWeek 13. Cultural DifferencesWeek 14. Cultural SustainabilityWeek 15. Cross-Cultural LearningWeek 16. Zero wasteWeek 17. Zero waste societyWeek 18. Group report

能夠在高壓情況下保持熱情和積極
能夠使用英語說、聽，以進行有效的人際溝通

name.zh: 多媒體影音應用「島」覽英文

courses.description: 藉由教授英語導覽的相關語言技巧，輔以介紹AI 工具的使用以及多媒體影音剪輯的技巧，學生將學會如何以英語介紹台灣的觀光景點，以及製作出有創意的英語導覽開箱影片。In this course, students will acquire the English-speaking skills necessary for delivering English tour guide speeches. They will also learn to use AI tools to create innovative content and edit their own English tour videos to introduce tourist spots in Taiwan.

syllabus.zh: 1 地點介紹的句型/ 自然美景的描繪2. 歷史特色介紹 / 文化要點介紹3. 建築特色介紹4. 娛樂相關設施介紹5. 地方美食介紹6. 增進互動體驗的英語句型 / 鼓勵遊客進一步探索景點句型7. 影音剪輯軟體教學8. 應用AI 工具輔助
syllabus.en: 1. Introduction of the place / Highlighting Natural Beauty2. Notable Historical Significance / Highlighting Cultural Importance3. Mentioning Architectural Marvels4. Emphasizing Recreational Activities5. Describing Local Cuisine6. Promoting Interactive Experiences / Encouraging Exploration7. Film Editing Tools8. Application of AI tools

courses.description: The objective of this course is to guide students in the advance study of operations management. Articles regarding the practices and theory of operations management are addressed and discussed in the class.

syllabus.zh: The class engages a seminar on the topics of operations management in enterprises. The topics include, but not limited to:1.	Operations management - Competitiveness, strategy, and productivity2.	System, Product and service design3.	Forecasting and Capacity planning4.	Facilities and Location planning5.	Quality management6.	Inventory management 7.	Scheduling 8.	JIT and Lean production9.	MRP and ERP10.	Supply chain management
syllabus.en: The class engages a seminar on the topics of operations management in enterprises. The topics include, but not limited to:1.	Operations management - Competitiveness, strategy, and productivity2.	System, Product and service design3.	Forecasting and Capacity planning4.	Facilities and Location planning5.	Quality management6.	Inventory management 7.	Scheduling 8.	JIT and Lean production9.	MRP and ERP10.	Supply chain management

courses.description: This course will introduce interesting and useful advanced management science techniques and methodologies those can be applied to managerial decision making. Mathematical models and optimization methods such as Linear/Integer Programming are developed and extended to cover variations in the management context to logistics, networks, financial, forecasting, inventory, and strategic planning. Other topics may include decision analysis, stochastic modelling and game theory. But the emphasis of the course will be placed on the conceptual understanding and application of the tools rather than the mathematics or the mechanics behind the tools.

syllabus.zh: 1.	數學規劃；2.	網路模式；3.	非線性規劃；4.	決策分析；5.	隨機模式；6.	模擬；7.	預測；8.	存貨；9.	專案管理。
syllabus.en: 1.	Linear/Integer Programming;2.	Network3.	Nonlinear Programming;4.	Decision Analysis;5.	Stochastic Models；6.	Simulation7.	Forecasting;8.	Inventory9.	Project Management

courses.weeklySchedule: Week 1. IntroductionWeek 3. Linear ProgrammingWeek 4. LP: Formulation& ApplicationsWeek 5. What -If Analysis for Linear ProgrammingWeek 6. Network Optimization ProblemsWeek 8. Using Binary Integer Programming to Deal with Yes-or-No DecisionsWeek 9. MidtermWeek 10~Week 11. Nonlinear ProgrammingWeek 12~Week 13. Decision AnalysisWeek 14~Week 15. ForecastingWeek 15~Week 16. Queueing ModelsWeek 16~Week 17.SimulationWeek 18. Term Exam

courses.description: Knowledge is a crucial key factor to the business success in today’s competitive environment where competitive advantages are based on the knowledge-based view of the firm and effective utilization of firm’s resources. This course explains the concept of knowledge management and how firms seek to manage knowledge through formal organizational practices and informal social mechanism. Important topics covered in this course include Strategy and knowledge in organizations (managing business intelligence, understanding the strategic value of human capital); Enhancing knowledge workflows (utilizing tacit and explicit knowledge, system-views of knowledge management); Knowledge learning and sharing (making organizations learn, transferring knowledge, facilitating communities of practice).

syllabus.zh: 知識管理 (KM) 簡介•概述知識和知識管理•知識的視角與知識基礎觀•知識管理的實際影響在組織中的知識管理• 知識管理戰略• 基於知識的組織文化• 組織學習與學習型組織• KM 過程和知識工人當前主題在知識管理研究• 知識轉移• 實踐社區
syllabus.en: Knowledge management (KM): An Introduction•Overview of knowledge and KM•Perspectives of knowledge and knowledge-based view•KM practical implicationsManaging knowledge in organizations•KM strategy•Knowledge-based organizational culture•Organizational learning and learning organizations•KM process and knowledge workersCurrent topics in KM research•Knowledge transfer•Communities of practice

courses.description: 1.本課程藉由研讀相關理論、學術文獻及資料操作，提供學生發展研究商業暨管理會計能力。The seminar is to enable doctoral students to develop the skills to conduct their own research through exploring different theories and topics of business and management accounting and conducting computer practice.  2.本課程將介紹可運用於商學及管理會計的量化及質性研究方法。This seminar will be focused on the research methodology (quantitative and qualitative approach) related to managerial accounting and business field.

syllabus.zh: 1.介紹管理會計研討2.管理會計研究架構3.成本分攤方法4.非財務績效指標5.運營和資本預算6.績效激勵計劃(A)7.績效激勵計劃(B)8.管理會計研究中方法9.管理控制10.策略績效管理系統11.環境會計，歷史和評論12.管理會計研究中的各種主題13.管理控制其他視角14.管理會計倫理
syllabus.en: 1. Introduction of Seminar in Management Accounting2. Frameworks in Management Accounting Research3. Cost Allocation Methods4. Non-Financial Performance Measures5. Operational and Capital Budgets6. Performance-Based Incentive Plans (A)7. Performance-Based Incentive Plans (B)8. Some methods in Management Accounting Research9. Management Controls10. Strategic Performance Management System11. Environmental Accounting, History, and Critic12. Various Topics in Management Accounting Research13. Alternative Perspectives on Management Control14. Ethics in Management Accounting

courses.weeklySchedule: This course will be focused on the research methodology (quantitative and quantitative approach) related to business and management field. Learning to apply knowledge and skills to your future research or develop research idea. 第1週: 介紹管理會計研討  (Introduction) 第2週: 管理會計研究架構 (Framework of business research) 第3週: 績效管理 I （Performance management I / Qualitative research) 第4週: 績效管理  II（Performance management II/ Quantitative research)第5週: 績效管理  III（Performance management III / Mixed Design)第6週: 作業制成本制度 I（ABC)ㄥPragmatic Approach /and Publication)第7週: 作業制成本制度 II（ABC)ㄥPragmatic Approach /and Publication)第8週: 管理會計研究中方法 I (Modern methods applying in business and managerial accounting research I)第9週: 管理會計研究中方法 II (Modern methods applying  in business and managerial accounting research II)第10週: 管理會計研究中方法 III (Modern methods applying  in business and managerial accounting research III)第11週: 企業社會責任與環境 I （ESG I）第12週: 企業社會責任與環境  II （ESG II）第13週: 問卷設計與商業管會研究 I (Survey design in business and managerial accounting research, I)第14週: 問卷設計與商業管會研究 II ((Survey design in business and managerial accounting research, II)第15週: 管理會計研究中的各種主題 I (Other issues and research methods applying in business and managerial accounting research I) 第16週: 管理會計研究中的各種主題 II (Other issues and research methods applying in business and managerial accounting II) 第17週: 管理會計倫理 (Ethic issues in business and managerial accounting)第18週: 期末報告 (Final Presentation)

courses.description: Data mining programs are intended to search through data for hidden relationships and patterns in your data. This is particularly pertinent to marketing companies who want to know what made a specific group of people buy their product. It can also be very important in scientific fields such as medicine where finding correlations in groups of people who are affected by a similar disease could be very helpful. Data mining is needed to make sense and use of the rapidly growing data and is an essential field of the 21st century.

syllabus.zh: 1.資料探勘與機器學習的簡介2.機器學習與分類分析3.資料的輸入：概念、範例、屬性4.分類分析方法：決策樹5.模式的評估6.分群分析7.關聯分析
syllabus.en: 1. Introduction: Machine Learning and Data Mining2. Machine Learning and Classification3. Input: Concepts, instances, attributes4. Classification: Decision Trees5. Model Evaluation and Credibility6. Clustering7. Associations

courses.weeklySchedule: 1.be able to describe the generic characteristics of data mining2.understand the concept, procedure and technique of data mining3.preprocess the raw data with the related software4.have developed your own data mining application5.analyze the business data and interpret the analysis results6.be prepared for independent, critical study and assessment of publications about data mining

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 1.be able to describe the generic characteristics of data mining
understand the concept, procedure and technique of data mining
preprocess the raw data with the related software
have developed your own data mining application
analyze the business data and interpret the analysis results
be prepared for independent, critical study and assessment of publications about data mining

courses.description: 本課程目標在於立足策略觀點了解影響企業創新行為之相關學術理論。同時藉由回顧與討論相關經典學術論文及相關實務案例，培養學生利用理論詮釋企業創新行為的能力。The purpose of this course is based on the strategic view to understand which academic theories can be applied to explain a firm’s innovation behaviors. Also, by reviewing and discussing related classic academic papers and related practical cases, the students can employ suitable theories to interpret the innovative behaviors of a firm.

syllabus.zh: 1.	創新的產出2.	產業組織觀點下的創新行為3.	制度理論觀點下的創新行為4.	環境因素觀點下的創新行為5.	資源稟賦觀點下的創新行為6.	組織學習觀點下的創新行為7.	跨組織合作觀點下的創新行為8.	公司治理觀點下的創新行為
syllabus.en: 1.	The outputs of corporate innovation2.	The industrial organization (IO) view of corporate innovation3.	The institutional view of corporate innovation4.	The environmental view of corporate innovation5.	The resource view of corporate innovation6.	The organizational learning view of corporate innovation7.	The inter-organizational view of corporate innovation8.	The corporate governance view of corporate innovation

courses.description: The objective of this course is to enhance the statistical data analytic ability for PhD students majored in business or social sciences, to help them analyze their research data appropriately. The course content covers not only methodologies for analyzing the cross-sectional data but also those for analyzing the longitudinal data (time series, panel data, etc.). Because some of these techniques are rather advanced, students are expected to have some background in elementary statistical data analysis. We will emphasize the concept of every given technique and its use, will demonstrate its application by examples, and will help students learn how to interpret the resulting output obtained from the widely used statistical package SPSS (Statistical Package for Social Sciences) , AMOS (Analysis of moment structures), STATA (statistical software for data science), and HLM (Hierarchical Linear Modeling), etc.

syllabus.zh: 1.	Regression2.	Logistic Regression3.	Analysis of Covariance (ANCOVA)4.	Mediation Analysis5.	Moderation Analysis6.	Common Method Variance (CMV)7.	The Multitrait-Multimethod Model8.	The Latent Growth Curve Method (LGM)9.	The Latent Class Model (LCM)10.	Time Series and Panel Data Analysis11.	Hierarchical Linear Modeling (HLM)
syllabus.en: 1.	Regression2.	Logistic Regression3.	Analysis of Covariance (ANCOVA)4.	Mediation Analysis5.	Moderation Analysis6.	Common Method Variance (CMV)7.	The Multitrait-Multimethod Model8.	The Latent Growth Curve Method (LGM)9.	The Latent Class Model (LCM)10.	Time Series and Panel Data Analysis11.	Hierarchical Linear Modeling (HLM)

courses.weeklySchedule: Week1: IntroductionWeek2: Analysis of Covariance (ANCOVA)：Regression with Qualitative PredictorsWeek3-4: Logistic Regression & Multi-category Logit Model：Regression with a Binary (Dichotomous) or a Polychotomous Response VariableWeek5-8: Hierarchical Linear Modeling (HLM)－Non-Repeated MeasuresWeek9: Midterm ExaminationWeek10-11: Hierarchical Linear Modeling (HLM)－Repeated MeasuresWeek12-17: The Basics of Time Series and Panel Data AnalysisWeek18: Final Examination

teachingAndAssessment.objective: To be able to distinguish between cross-sectional data and longitudinal data.
To be able to analyze cross-sectional data and longitudinal data using appropriate statistical methods.
To be able to apply statistical packages for analysis and interpret their resulting outputs properly.
To be able to understand the relative statistical analyses in journal articles.

courses.referenceBooks: 1. An Introduction to Categorical Data Analysis, Alan Agresti, 3rd edition (2020)2. Multilevel Analysis -Techniques and Applications, Joop Hox and Mirjam Moerbeek, 3rd edition (2017)3. Multilevel and Longitudinal Modeling with IBM SPSS, Ronald H. Heck et al., 2nd edition (2014)4. Panel Data Analysis using EViews, I. Gusti Ngurah Agung, 1st edition5. Introductory Econometrics: A Modern Approach, Jeffrey M. Wooldridge, 7th edition (2019)
courses.teachingSoftware: SPSS, PROCESS, AMOS, SmartPLS, HLM, R Studio
courses.rules: 1.	No Absence；No Late Homework；No Cheating2.	No makeup exams will be given because it is not worth the time to rewrite an exam for only one or two students. NO EXCEPTIONS!     (Midterm Exam: April 19, 2024; Final Exam: June 21, 2024)3.	All exams are Open Books, Open Notes, Open Internet, and you are permitted to use Calculator, Computer and even PAD, while Cell Phone is forbidden.

courses.description: The subject aims to provide students the capability to engage an independent study on the assigned by his/her advisor. It will facilitate students’ research skills and experience as well as their knowledge on the topic.

syllabus.zh: Students need to complete the following tasks of the course, including1.	working with course advisor to form the research topic, or on the assigned topic by advisor, 2.	engaging a comprehensive literature survey of the topic,3.	structuring the report for the research topic, and 4.	Writing a report of the study, and publishing it at a peer-reviewed international academic conference in the next semester.

name.zh: 國際學院英語訓練課程(二)

courses.description: This is the first semester of a two semester program designed to help students get ready for studying abroad. Students will work on improving their academic speaking, listening, reading and writing skills.
courses.prerequisites:
1. 本課程為國際學院之必修英文課程
2. 欲參加此課程之學生必須達到學校要求之入學英文門檻分數

syllabus.zh: 本課程為國際學院學生英語必修課程，本課程以加強學生學術領域英文之聽、說、讀、寫之能力。
syllabus.en: Speaking•Pair work and small group discussions which focuses on specific IELTS test questions•Extensive practice expressing, explaining and giving reasons for opinions and preferences•Oral presentations that teach students how to organize topics•Simulated IELTS speaking testsListening•Real life listening practices which teach students to listen for context•Timed listening practices where students practice listening for main ideas and details•Practice listening to lectures (5+ minutes)•Learning to listen for signaling in lecture language•Simulated IELTS listening testsReading•Intensive reading of medium-length academic passages•Training in skimming and scanning•Training in reading strategies such as surveying, predicting, and summarizing•Training in how to recognize unknown vocabulary from context•Simulated reading testsWriting•General grammar instruction•Training on thought development in order to be able to logically express an opinion in writing•Instruction and practice on describing graphs, charts, tables, maps, and diagrams in written English•Practice writing in a timed atmosphere•Frequent writing homework assignments•Simulated IELTS writing tests

學習以英語口說及英語文字溝通
增進學生聽、說、讀、寫的能力
共同完成課堂作業，並學習共同參與、協助以完成團體討論。

courses.description: 服務學習課程分為「校園服務學習與反思」、「班級師生共學」、「個人實踐」及「心得報告」，讓學生在校園環境實作過程裡做中學、與老師共同學習一起成長、於自主報名的多元活動中，學習與他人溝通並互助合作。從校內認識周遭，再到校外關懷社區，反思多元體驗學習的歷程，並體會生活中的便利均來自他人付出、同理他人付出的辛勞，落實生活教育，將負責、關懷等正向態度延續至大四，乃至未來進入職場。

syllabus.zh: 1. 服務學習 (校園服務學習與反思、班級師生共學及個人實踐) 課程介紹。2. 參與生活教育體驗學習。3. 參與各類校園或社會關懷活動。4. 撰寫心得報告。
syllabus.en: 1. Introduction of Service Learning Course (Campus Service Learning & Reflections, Service Learning with mentor and Individual Participation).2. Participating in life education experiential learning.3. Participating in campus activities or social concern activities.4. Final report.

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 1.	於校園環境實作中，為自己生活的環境負責，學習生活中的品德教育與服務精神，並從中培養面對困難及解決困難的能力。
2.	在班級師生共學中，與同學和老師一同參與，透過互助合作及討論，於過程中認識不同議題、新知及學習實用知識與技能。
2.	在班級師生共學中，與同學和老師一同參與，透過互助合作及討論，於過程中認識不同議題、新知及學習實用知識與技能。
3.	透過參與個人實踐，在各類校園或社會關懷活動中，接觸更廣闊的事物，看見不一樣的世界，進而發自內心給予幫助與關懷。
4.	經由反思及心得報告，回顧這門課的學習歷程，並學習表達自己於課程中遇到的困難及得到的體悟。

courses.description: This course will be a broad survey of Western history and culture with a focus on EQ and the origin and development of gender roles. We will look at how gender roles have been assigned, and the role of media in disseminating images of gender and interpersonal relations. This will include drama, literature, short stories, film and television. Students will be required to discuss these topics in class, and their analytical skills will finally be put into execution in the final two regular classes, in which students will be required to make presentations about related topical issues in Taiwanese culture and media.

syllabus.zh: Although theoretically a course in social relations, a main focus of the course will be English comprehension and communication. Students will read articles and excerpts from plays and stories as well as watching English-only television and media clips. Each class will have lecture and teacher presentation, but will ultimately require student response and input. There will be small group work as well as presentation preparation and delivery.

courses.description: Through the freshman year, eight progresses of implementation in PE are:(1) Fitness(2) Basketball(3) Archery(4) Badminton(5) Soccer(6) Table Tennis(7) Volleyball(8) Softball
courses.prerequisites:
1. No pre-requisite is required.
2. When attending classes, please bring your own towel and water bottle with appropriate 
sports outfit. Disqualified outfit will be considered as an absence. 
3. No cell phone usage is allowed in classes unless you inform the instructor in advance.

syllabus.zh: 1.體適能：培養學生基本體能。(心肺功能、肌力肌耐力、柔軟度、爆發力、身體指數)2.籃球：訓練學生籃球基本動作，培養互助合作之人格特質，訓練休閒活動技巧。3.射箭：訓練學生手、眼睛神經之協調性，訓練基本休閒運動能力。4.羽球：培養學生瞬間移位的基本體能，各種基本運動能力的培養。5.高爾夫/足球：訓練學生腳部之敏捷性，培養學生團體合作與心態。6.桌球：訓練學生眼、手之協調性及敏捷性，培養基本休閒能力之技巧。7.排球：訓練學生全身肌力協調能力，培養學生團體合作之觀念。8.壘球/木球：訓練學生瞬間爆發力的能力，手、腳、眼睛的協調性，培養互助合作的觀念。
syllabus.en: (1) Fitness –Develop students’ basic physical fitness (cardiovascular, muscle strength, muscle endurance, power, flexibility, Body Mess Index (BMI) (2) Basketball—Expand mutual cooperation personality, introduce and cultivate basic movements in basket, and learn leisure activity skills (3) Archery—Develop hand-eye coordination and basic abilities in leisure activity. (4) Badminton--Improve instant shifting ability and cultivate basic exercise abilities. (5) Soccer—Develop foot agility and cultivate the idea of teamwork. (6) Table Tennis—Arise hand-eye coordination and agility, foster basic leisure ability(7) Volleyball—Cultivates muscle coordination through the whole body and develop the concept of teamwork(8) Softball—Advance explosive ability, hand-eye coordination, and mutual assistance in peers

courses.description: This course continues the topics covered in Financial Accounting I, with a focus on the liabilities and equities. We identify the nature of liabilities and prepare all entries required for short-term and long-term liabilities. We emphasize the concepts of liabilities, equity issuance, dividends, share repurchases, and basic financial statement analysis of cash flows. This course also identifies and calculates financial ratios to assist in the analysis of the financial position of a company.

syllabus.zh: 一、長期負債1.應付債券的性質與發行2.應付債券的清償與轉換二、合夥會計1.合夥組織概述2.合夥會計的特徵3.合夥損益的分配三、公司會計1.公司的概念2.股本的概念3.股本的發行4.庫藏股票5.每股帳面價值四、投資1. 金融資產的分類2. 金融資產的衡量3. 金融資產的損益認列4. 長期股權投資五、現金流量表1.現金流量表的目的2.現金流量的分類3.現金流量表的編制六、財務報表分析1.財務報表分析的意義2.財務報表分析的方法3.共同比分析4.比率分析
syllabus.en: The course will cover the following important topics:1. Current Liabilities2. Accounting for Partnerships3. Accounting for Corporations4. Long-Term Liabilities5. Investments and International Operations6. Statement of Cash Flows7. Analysis of Financial Statements
